Beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
stats: You and your minions deal 50% increased melee damage

Druid.name: Druid
stats: When leaving a transformed state, you gain 70% damage reduction for 2 seconds

Primalist-0.name: Primal Strength
reminderText: Each point of strength increases armour by 4% and improves skills that rely on the raw strength of you and your companions, such as Swipe and Summon Wolf.

Primalist-1.name: Natural Attunement
reminderText: Each point of attunement grants 2 mana and improves skills that rely on the innate magic inside you and your surroundings, such as Gathering Storm and Summon Thorn Totem.

Primalist-3.name: Hunter's Restoration
description: You have increased health and every 3 seconds your next hit restores your health.
reminderText:
This effect can only proc if you are not on full health.

Your "hits" do not include damage over time or minion skills

Primalist-4.name: Primal Medicine
stats: 50% Percent Of Potion Healing Received By Minions
description: Your minions deal increased damage, and using a potion also heals your minions for a percentage of the amount it heals you.

Primalist-5.name: Survival of the Pack
stats: 0.5% Minion Melee Damage Leeched as Health

Primalist-7.name: Tempest Bond
stats: Doubled while you have a minion
description: You deal increased physical, cold, and lightning damage. These bonuses are doubled while you have an active minion.

Primalist-8.name: Hunter's Emanation
description: The healing from {Hunter's Restoration} also applies to your minions, and when you trigger Hunter's Restoration, your minions gain increased damage for 3 seconds.

Primalist-10.name: Harmony of Blades
description: You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping an axe or sword in your off hand. You take more damage while dual wielding (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-12.name: Ursine Strength
description: You have additional strength and take less damage from nearby enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Each point of strength increases armour by 4% and improves skills that rely on the raw strength of you and your companions, such as Swipe and Summon Wolf.

Primalist-14.name: Artor's Loyalty
description:
You are limited to a single companion.

Your companion is larger and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-15.name: Ambush
stats: Aspect Of The Shark Granted On Melee Attack
description: Every 5 seconds, your next melee attack deals increased damage and grants {Aspect of the Shark} for 3 seconds, a buff that increases melee damage by 75% and melee attack speed by 10%.

Primalist-16.name: Lamprey Teeth
stats: 1.5% Minion Melee Damage Leeched as Health

Primalist-18.name: Tusk Warrior
description: {Aspect of the Boar} also grants increased physical damage and a chance for attacks and spells to cause enemies to bleed.

Primalist-19.name: Boar Heart
stats: 1 Aspect Of The Boar Duration When Hit (Seconds)
description: You are granted {Aspect of the Boar} for a duration when hit by a melee attack, a buff that reduces damage taken by 15%. This effect has a 2 second cooldown.

Primalist-20.name: Hawk Wings
description: You and your minions have increased dodge rating, and you and your minions have a chance to gain {Haste} on hit.

Primalist-21.name: Cry of the Lynx
notScalingStats: Casting Companion Abilities Grants Aspect Of The Lynx
description:
You and your companions have an increased chance to critically strike. 

When you use a companion ability, you and your companions are granted {Aspect of the Lynx} for a duration, a buff that grants 100% increased critical strike chance and 100% increased stun chance.

Primalist-24.name: Call of the Pack
stats: 20 Heal Amount On Companion Ability Use
description: You and your companions have additional health, and you and your companions are healed whenever you use a companion ability.
reminderText:
The health restored is affected by increased healing effectiveness.

This effect does not trigger when your companions abilities are triggered automatically.

Primalist-25.name: Rending Maw
stats: +20% Aspect Of The Shark Armour Shred Chance
description: {Aspect of the Shark} also grants attacks and spells a chance to reduce enemy armor.

Primalist-26.name: Rattlesnake Rattlesnake
stats: 15% Increased Aspect Of The Viper Duration
+4% Poison Penetration with Aspects of the Viper
description: {Aspect of the Viper} lasts longer and grants you Poison Penetration.

Primalist-27.name: Life in the Wilderness
stats: Your Endurance Also Applies to Companions
description: You have additional vitality and a higher endurance threshold. Your endurance and endurance threshold from all sources also apply to your companions.
reminderText:
Each point of vitality grants 6 health and 1% poison and necrotic resistance.

Endurance reduces the damage you take below your endurance threshold. You have a base Endurance Threshold of 20% of your maximum health. Endurance is capped at 60%.

Primalist-28.name: Serrated Claws
stats: +10% Aspect Of The Lynx Critical Multiplier
description: You and your companions' critical strikes deal more damage, and {Aspect of the Lynx} now also grants critical strike damage.

Primalist-29.name: Avian Shelter
description: You have a higher endurance threshold and you and your minions have additional physical resistance.
reminderText: Endurance reduces the damage you take below your endurance threshold. You have a base Endurance Threshold of 20% of your maximum health. Endurance is capped at 60%.

Primalist-30.name: Feeding Frenzy
stats: 10 Max Aspect Of The Shark Stacks
-60% Less Aspect Of The Shark Effect
description: {Aspect of the Shark} can now stack up to 10 times, but it is significantly less effective (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-31.name: Critical Bite
stats: 3% Damage Leeched as Health on Crit with Aspect of the Lynx
description: {Aspect of the Lynx} also grants a percentage of damage leeched as health when you critically strike.

Primalist-32.name: Natural Bond
description:
You are limited to only one companion.

Your companion is granted more health and deals more damage (both effects are multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-33.name: Primal Aspects
description: All {Aspect} buffs from this tree last longer.

Primalist-34.name: Ancient Might
reminderText: Each point of strength increases armour by 4% and improves skills that rely the raw strength of you and your companions, such as Fury Leap and Summon Wolf.

Primalist-36.name: Sky Warrior
notScalingStats: 10% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Fury Leap
10% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Crowstorm
description: You and your minions gain increased damage.

Primalist-37.name: Ancestral Speed
description: Your totems have increased cast speed and you have a chance to gain {Haste} for 3 seconds when you directly summon a totem.

Primalist-38.name: Totemic Fury
stats: 5% Increased Attack Speed With Active Totem
5% Increased Cast Speed With Active Totem
description: You have increased attack and cast speed while you have an active totem.

Primalist-39.name: Rhythm of Thunder
description: Every 3 seconds, your next melee attack deals additional lightning damage.

Primalist-40.name: Silent Protector
stats: 3% Increased Mana Regen With Active Totem
description: You and your totems have additional armor while you have an active totem and you have increased mana regen while you have an active totem.

Primalist-41.name: Shamanic Infusion
description: You have additional attunement. You and your minions penetrate enemy physical, cold, and lightning resistances.
reminderText: Penetration can bring enemies below 0% resistance, causing them to take more damage.

Primalist-42.name: Wind Bringer
description: You and your minions have increased cold damage, increased physical damage and additional dodge rating.

Primalist-43.name: Storm Bringer
description: You and your minions have increased lightning damage and additional lightning resistance.

Primalist-44.name: Hail Bringer
description: You and your minions have a chance to chill on hit, a higher chance to freeze enemies and additional cold resistance.

Primalist-45.name: Rune of Awe
description: You and your minions have additional spell damage.

Primalist-48.name: Protective Circle
description:
You have additional physical and elemental resistance for each active totem.

Additionally, your totems have resistances against all damage types.

Primalist-49.name: Swirling Maelstrom
stats: 5% Chance To Cast Maelstrom When Hit
description:
You have additional health and mana, and have a chance to cast {Maelstrom} when hit. 

This effect has a 3 second cooldown.

Primalist-51.name: Glacial Strike
description: You have additional strength

Primalist-53.name: Ascendant Circle
stats: 1% More Spell Damage With Active Totem
description: While you have an active totem you have more spell damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-55.name: Deep Wounds
stats: +15% Physical Penetration with Bleed with Aspect of the Boar
description: {Aspect of the Boar} also grants Bleed you inflict additional Physical Penetration.

Primalist-56.name: Porcine Constitution
stats: 4% Aspect Of The Boar Chance On Melee Hit
description:
{Aspect of the Boar} grants additional damage reduction, and now also grants increased health regeneration.

Additionally, your hits have a chance to grant you {Aspect of the Boar}.
reminderText: {Aspect of the Boar} is a buff that reduces damage taken by 15%.

Primalist-57.name: The Circle Of Life
stats: 5% Aspect Of The Shark Chance On Kill
description: You gain health and have a chance to be granted {Aspect Of The Shark} for 3 seconds whenever you kill an enemy.
reminderText: {Aspect of the Shark} increases melee damage by 75% and melee attack speed by 10%.

Primalist-58.name: Viper Fangs
stats: 3% Aspect Of The Viper Chance On Hit
description:
You and your companions have increased melee attack speed.

When you hit an enemy, you have a chance for you and your companions to be granted {Aspect of the Viper} for 3 seconds, a buff that grants 100% chance to poison on hit and 100% increased damage over time.

Primalist-59.name: Dragon Slayer
stats: Aspect Of The Shark Chance On Hit Against Rares And Bosses
description: The On Kill effects of {Circle Of Life} also have an equal chance to trigger when you hit a rare or boss enemy.

Primalist-60.name: Lagonian Wrath
notScalingStats: 25% Chance To Cast Storm Bolt When Hit

Primalist-61.name: Tempest Form
notScalingStats: 5 Mana Gained On Gathering Storm Hit
description: You and your minions have additional health, a chance to shock and a chance to chill on hit.

Primalist-63.name: Avatar of Thunder
notScalingStats: +2% Shared Spell Lightning Penetration Per 5 Attunement
description: You and your minions gain additional spell lightning damage.

Primalist-64.name: Shattered Heavens
description: You and your minions deal additional cold damage with spells and attacks, and your hits have a chance to inflict Frostbite.

Primalist-66.name: Storm Blade
stats: 1% More Melee Damage With Active Totem
description: While you have an active totem you have more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-67.name: Hunters of the Deep
stats: 15% Increased Aspect Of The Shark Duration
notScalingStats: Companions Gain Aspect Of The Shark
description: Your companions are granted {Aspect of the Shark} whenever you are, and Aspect of the Shark lasts longer.
reminderText: {Aspect of the Shark} increases melee damage by 75% and melee attack speed by 10%

Primalist-68.name: Thunder Strike
description: Your melee attacks have a chance to cast {Storm Bolt} on hit.
reminderText: Triggering Stom Bolt from this node has a 1 second cooldown

Primalist-69.name: Lagon's Answer
stats: 8% Chance To Cast Storm Bolt On Spell Cast
20% Chance To Cast Storm Bolt Every Second While Channelling
description:
Your direct spell casts have a chance to cast {Storm Bolt}.
While channeling, you have a chance to cast {Storm Bolt} every second.
reminderText: Triggering Storm Bolt from this node has a 1 second cooldown

Primalist-70.name: Conflux
stats: 1% Less Damage Taken from Shocked Enemies
notScalingStats: 20% Chance for Indirect Storm Bolt Casts to Doublecast
description:
Your area skills have increased area, and you take less damage from shocked enemies.

Your totems also gain the area increases for area skills.

Primalist-71.name: Spirit Warden
notScalingStats: Mana Or Rage Cost As Health On Spell Cast

Primalist-72.name: Blossoming Garden
notScalingStats: Eterra's Blessing On Nearby Ally On Spell Or Movement Skill Use
description: Increases healing effectiveness for you and your minions.
reminderText: Increased healing effectiveness increases the health restored by healing skills and effects.

Primalist-74.name: Fetid Resilience
stats: 7% Increased Damage Over Time While Transformed
3% Less Damage Over Tme Taken In Human Form
description: You deal increased damage over time while transformed and take less damage over time in human form (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Primalist-76.name: Nightshade Fangs
description: Your melee attacks have a chance to inflict Bleed on hit and your spells have a chance to inflict Poison on hit.

Primalist-77.name: Thicket of Thorns
stats: +2% Chance To Cast Thorn Shield On You When Hit
description: You have a chance to cast {Thorn Shield} on yourself when you are hit and you have increased armor and reflect damage back to attackers.
reminderText: Thorn Shield is a Spriggan Form skill. it can be modified by nodes on the Spriggan Form tree.

Primalist-78.name: Natural Duality
stats: 30% Increased Damage With An Active Companion
description: You are limitted to one companion, but that companion has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers). If you control a companion you deal increased damage and have additional armour.

Primalist-79.name: Wind in the Leaves
description: Increases the attack and cast speed of you and your minions.

Primalist-80.name: Totemic Restoration
notScalingStats: 10% Chance To Summon Healing Totem When Hit
reminderText: Increased healing effectiveness increases the health restored by healing skills and effects.

Primalist-81.name: Focused Wrath
description: You deal increased damage while transformed and your rage decays slower.

Primalist-84.name: Woodland Beings
reminderText: Increased healing effectiveness increases the health restored by healing skills and effects.

Primalist-85.name: Reincarnation
stats: 100 Healing For You And Your Minions On Transform
notScalingStats: Shapeshifter Applies To Minions On Transform
description: You and your minions are healed when you transform. This scales with increases to healing effectiveness.

Primalist-86.name: Rotbane
notScalingStats: Totems Are Immune To Poison Damage

Primalist-89.name: Chitinous Plating
reminderText:
Endurance reduces the damage you take below your endurance threshold. You have a base Endurance Threshold of 20% of your maximum health. Endurance is capped at 60%.

Locusts are minions that can be summoned in Swarmblade Form.

Primalist-90.name: Force of Nature
description: You and your minions deal additional physical damage with spells and melee attacks.

Primalist-91.name: Eternal Nature
description: You and your companions have additional spell damage.

Primalist-92.name: Tiger Spirit
description: You have increased critical strike chance and multiplier while you have the {Shapeshifter} buff.

Primalist-93.name: Primal Shifter
description: You gain the {Shapeshifter} buff for a limited duration when you transform, granting you increased armor and damage.

Primalist-94.name: Impervious
notScalingStats: 4% Less Hit Damage Taken Per Stack
Lose All Stacks After 10 Seconds Of Inactivity
description: Your melee hits have a 20% chance to grant you a stack of {Impervious} causing you to take less damage from hits (multiplicative with other modifiers), but you lose a stack when you are hit and you lose all stacks after 10 seconds of not gaining any stacks.

Primalist-98.name: Blessed Springs
description: Increases cold damage and healing effectiveness for you and your minions.
reminderText: Increased healing effectiveness increases the health restored by healing skills and effects. It does not affect other sources of health gain such as health leech or health regen.

Primalist-100.name: Toxic Reach
notScalingStats: 36% Chance To Summon A Vine On Kill
description: Your and your minions' hits have a chance to poison.

Primalist-102.name: Fist of Stone
notScalingStats: 1% Increased Health Regen per 1% Uncapped Endurance
description:
You and your minions gain increased stun chance.

Additionally, you have additional Endurance.

Primalist-103.name: Heorot's Path
description: You and your minions have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

Primalist-104.name: Hideskin
stats: +1% Maximum Health Gained As Endurance Threshold
description: You have additional health and gain a percentage of your maximum health as endurance threshold.
reminderText: Endurance reduces the damage you take below your endurance threshold. You have a base Endurance Threshold of 20% of your maximum health. Endurance is capped at 60%.

Primalist-107.name: Ironbark
description: You have additional health and armor, and these effects are tripled for your totems.

Primalist-109.name: Ocean Maw
stats: 15% Increased Aspect Of The Shark Duration
description: {Aspect of the Shark} is more effective and lasts longer.

Primalist-110.name: Rancour
stats: No Rage Decay Out Of Combat
description: Your rage only decays if you have used an ability recently (past 4 seconds).

Primalist-111.name: Aspects of Might
notScalingStats: 1% Increased Armor Per Strength In Human Or Spriggan
1% Increased Melee Damage Per Strength In Bear Or Swarmblade

Primalist-112.name: Piercing Gale
notScalingStats: 16% Increased Locusts Attack, Cast And Move Speed
16% Increased Crows Attack, Cast And Move Speed
description: You and your minions have additional cold penetration.
reminderText: Penetration can bring enemies below 0% resistance, causing them to take more damage. It applies to all damage, including damage over time.

Primalist-114.name: Cornered Beast
stats: 15% More Melee Damage on Low Health
4% Less Damage Taken on Low Health
description:
While at low health (below 35%) you take less damage and deal more melee damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

Additionally, when damage leaves you at low health you gain these benefits for 5 seconds if you aren't already at low health.

Primalist-115.name: Elder Branch
description: You and your totems deal additional spell damage. This bonus is tripled while using an axe.

Primalist-116.name: Ancestral Weaponry
stats: +5 Melee Cold Damage with a Two Handed Mace
+4 Melee Physical Damage with a Two Handed Axe
+3 Melee Lightning Damage with a Staff
description: You deal additional melee damage with most two handed weapons. The amount and damage type depend on the type of weapon used.

Primalist-118.name: Primordial Resonance
reminderText: Penetration can bring enemies below 0% resistance, causing them to take more damage. It applies to all damage, including damage over time.

Shaman.name: Shaman
stats: +50% elemental resistance while you control a totem

av75ch-2.name: Mountain Peak
description: Acalanche is now channeled, creating 1 large boulder every 1.5 seconds and 5 small boulders every second, but has a channeling cost every second.

av75ch-3.name: Precision
description: Small boulders now fall in a smaller area up to a maximum, causing them to hit more precisely at the target location.

av75ch-4.name: Crater
description:
Avalanche's every third large boulder creates an {Earthquake} on impact.

This effect consumes mana equal to a portion of {Earthquake's} mana cost.

av75ch-5.name: Naturaly Occuring
description: Avalanche costs less mana.

av75ch-6.name: Hailstorm
description:
The persisting Avalanche is now cast around you and follows your movement.

The large boulders will automatically target enemies within 6 meters.

av75ch-7.name: Unyielding Storm
description: Avalance now persists after you stop channeling for a duration equal to how long you spent channeling, up to a maximum.

av75ch-8.name: Harsh Winter
description: Avalanche deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

av75ch-9.name: Rockfall
stats: Freeze Rate Multiplier -> Increased Stun Chance
description: Avalanche's base cold damage is converted to physical damage, and freeze rate multiplier bonuses from this tree are converted to increased stun chance.
reminderText: If you have this and Frost, this node has no effect.

av75ch-10.name: Excavation
description:
Avalanche hits have an increased chance to stun enemies.

Additionally, the impact from the large boulders have a chance to create your {Upheaval} towards a nearby enemy.

This consumes mana equal to a portion of {Upheaval's} mana cost.

av75ch-11.name: Winter Buildup
description:
Avalanche costs less mana.

If it's channeled l it will reduce the channel cost instead.

av75ch-12.name: Grounding
description: Avalanche hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) while you have at least one active totem.

av75ch-13.name: Storm Slide
stats: +10 Lightning Damage In Range Of Storm Totem
description: While in range of a {Storm Totem}, Avalanche hits deal additional lightning damage.

av75ch-14.name: Stormcaller
description: Boulder hits have a chance to grant you a {Storm Stack}.

av75ch-15.name: Intensity
description: Small boulders have a chance to be replaced by large boulders.

av75ch-16.name: Snow Storm
description:
Avalanche drops additional small boulders.

If Avalanche is channeled, small boulders drop more frequently instead.

av75ch-17.name: Pummeling
description:
Large boulders will cause a {Fissure} to open underneath them, dealing physical damage over 4 seconds to enemies who stand on it.

You can have a maximum of 1 {Fissure} at a time.

av75ch-18.name: Alpine Guide
description:
Improves Avalanche's base critical strike chance.

When a large boulder critically strikes, it has a chance to drop a small boulder at the same location.

av75ch-19.name: Dead of Winter
description: Avalanche hits have an increased chance to freeze enemies.

av75ch-20.name: Frost
stats: Increased Stun Chance -> Freeze Rate Multiplier
description: Avalanche's base physical damage is converted to cold damage, and increased stun chance provided by this tree is converted to freeze rate multiplier.
reminderText: If you have this node and Rockfall, then the Rockfall node has no effect.

av75ch-21.name: Frost Touch
stats: 50% Large Boulder Chance To Leave Frozen Ground
description: Avalanche's large boulders have a chance to leave behind {Frozen Ground,} which chills all enemies who stand on it.

av75ch-22.name: Frosted Font
description:
{Frozen Ground} affects a larger area.

You and your allies standing on your {Frozen Ground} gain a chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

av75ch-23.name: Shatter Shot
description:
Avalanche hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This effect is doubled against frozen enemies.

av75ch-24.name: Explosive Impact
description: Avalanche boulders fall in a larger area, and each boulder has a larger area of impact.

av75ch-25.name: Mountain's Fury
description: Avalanche boulders have a larger area of impact.

av75ch-26.name: Unpredictability
description: Boulders fall in a larger area. This reduces your chance to hit single targets.

av75ch-27.name: Elemental Bond
description:
Large boulders have a chance to form into a {Coldstone Elemental}, which is a melee minion that deals cold and physical damage and decays over time.

You can summon up to 9 {Coldstone Elementals}, and summoning past this maximum will refresh the decay and health of the most decayed one.

av75ch-28.name: Absorption
description: When a {Coldstone Elemental} is hit by a boulder, they regain health and gain {Frenzy} and {Haste} for a short duration.

be36ar-2.name: Lacerating Claws
description: Your Bear deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

be36ar-3.name: Thorn Bear
description: Your Bear now cast {Briar Thorn,} a ranged spell that deals physical damage.

be36ar-4.name: Barbed Thorns
description: {Briar Thorns} cast by your Bear has a chance to deal double damage.

be36ar-5.name: Shredding Thorns
description: {Briar Thorns} cast by your Bear has a chance to reduce enemy armor.

be36ar-6.name: Rapid Thorns
description: Your Bear have increased cast speed.

be36ar-7.name: Retaliatory Thorns
description:
Your Bear retaliate with {Thorn Burst} when they take 75 damage.

This effect has a 1 second cooldown.

be36ar-8.name: Nightshade Bear
description: {Briar Thorns} and {Ice Thorns} cast by your Bear have a chance to poison enemies.

be36ar-9.name: Tearing Thorns
description: {Thorn Burst} cast by your Bear deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has additional chance to bleed on hit and.

be36ar-10.name: Winged Thorns
description: Thorns from {Thorn Burst} cast by your Bear travel faster and farther.

be36ar-11.name: Forceful Swipes
description: Your Bear can use {Swipe} with a 5 second cooldown. Your bear's swipes scale with its own stats, but are affected by your Swipe Tree.

be36ar-12.name: Rapid Swipes
description: Your Bear's {Swipe} has a shorter cooldown.

be36ar-13.name: Vicious Strikes
description: Your Bear deal more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and its melee attacks have a higher chance to stun enemies.

be36ar-14.name: Thick Hide
description: Your Bear has more health and takes less damage at low health.
reminderText:
Both of these effects are multiplicative with other modifiers.

Low health is defined as below 35% of maximum health.

be36ar-15.name: Claw Totems
stats: 10% Chance To Summon Claw Totem On Kill
description: You have a chance to summon a {Claw Totem} when your bear kills an enemy.
reminderText:
Claw totems do not scale with other nodes on this tree, but are affected by your Swipe Tree.

Claw Totems count as your minions, not your bear's minions.

be36ar-16.name: Primal Precision
description: Your Bear has additional critical strike chance.

be36ar-17.name: Unstoppable Force
description: Your Bear takes less damage from critical strikes and its own critical strikes deal more damage.
reminderText: Both of these effects are multiplicative with other modifiers

be36ar-18.name: Armoured Bears
description: Your Bear has additional armor based on your Strength

be36ar-19.name: Piercing Thorns
description: {Briar Thorns} cast by your Bear pierces enemies (continue through targets it hits), but your Bear has reduced cast speed.

be36ar-20.name: Ursine Endurance
description: Your Bear has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers), but {Briar Thorns} now has a cooldown.

be36ar-22.name: Wounded Prey
description: Your Bear has increased movement speed and deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of bleed on the target (up to 30).

be36ar-23.name: Ursine Dominion
description: Your Bear's melee attacks and roar have increased area of effect.

be36ar-24.name: Bellowing Roar
description: Your Bear's roar has increased area and healing effectiveness

be36ar-25.name: Endless Rampage
description: Your Bear has increased movement speed and cannot be stunned

eb5656-2.name: Safeguard
description: Eterra's Blessing grants elemental and poison resistance.

eb5656-3.name: Embolden
stats: 25% Increased Spell Damage On Next Cast
description: Your next spell after casting Eterra's Blessing deals increased damage.

eb5656-4.name: Lifestream
description: After casting Eterra's Blessing, your spells leech a portion of the damage they deal as health for 4 seconds.

eb5656-5.name: Natural Affinity
description: When cast on a minion, Eterra's Blessing grants stun immunity for 4 seconds.

eb5656-6.name: Caustic Renewal
description: When Eterra's Blessing is cast on your {Scorpion} companion, you are both granted a chance to poison enemies with attacks and spells for 4 seconds.

eb5656-7.name: Symbiosis
description: When Eterra's Blessing is cast on your {Sabertooth} or {Raptor} companions, you are both granted a chance to cause enemies to bleed with attacks and spells for 4 seconds.

eb5656-8.name: Ardent Touch
description: When cast on a minion, Eterra's Blessing also grants increased movement, attack, and cast speed for 4 seconds.

eb5656-9.name: Encourage
description: When Eterra's Blessing heals one of your companions it has a chance to refresh its activated ability cooldown, but Eterra's Blessing costs more mana.

eb5656-10.name: Swift Recovery
description: When Eterra's Blessing targets a downed companion, it heals them for a portion of their maximum downed duration.

eb5656-11.name: Eterra's Furor
description: When you directly cast Eterra's Blessing on a companion it taunts nearby enemies for 4 seconds. However Eterra's Blessing now has a long cooldown.

eb5656-12.name: Binding Heal
description: When Eterra's Blessing is cast on one of your companions, you also heal yourself for a portion of its base heal amount.

eb5656-13.name: Triage
description: Eterra's Blessing automatically targets the lowest health ally in range, but Eterra's Blessing costs more mana.

eb5656-14.name: Soul Bond
description: When Eterra's Blessing is cast on your {Spriggan} companion, you are both granted increased spell damage for 4 seconds.

eb5656-15.name: Overgrowth
stats: 25% Chance To Heal Allies Nearby Target
description: Eterra's Blessing has a chance to heal all allies nearby its target for 50 health.
reminderText: The area in which allies are healed is affect by Increased Area for Area Skills stats.

eb5656-16.name: Conservation
description: Eterra's Blessing costs less mana.

eb5656-18.name: Rebuke
description: Eterra's Blessing knocks back enemies a given distance from its target.
reminderText: Increased Area for Area Skills stats affect the area in which enemies are pushed back, but not how far they are pushed back.

eb5656-20.name: Rosebloom
description:
Whenever you directly cast Thorn Shield, you also cast Eterra's Blessing on the same target.

Consumes Eterra's Blessing's mana cost as rage.

eb5656-21.name: Skyboon
description: When Eterra's Blessing is cast on your Storm Crow companions, they are granted {Haste} and Frenzy for 5 seconds.

eb5656-23.name: Improved Blessing
description: Eterra's Blessing has increased healing effectiveness.

eb5656-24.name: Purge
description: Eterra's Blessing cleanses all ailments on its target.

eb5656-26.name: Efflorescence
description: Eterra's Blessing heals half of its value immediately, and half of its value over 4 seconds.

eb5656-27.name: Regrowth
description: When {Efflorescence's} heal over time expires, heal again for half of Eterra's Blessing's value.

eb5656-28.name: Tranquil Spirit
description: When you are out of mana Eterra's Blessing is free, but Eterra's Blessing can no longer provide additional buffs.

eb5656-29.name: Ancestral Renewal
stats: 34# Chance To Summon Healing Totem On High Health Heal
description: When you heal a target that is already at high health, you have a chance to summon a {Healing Totem} at its location which heals nearby allies.
reminderText: Targets above 65% max health are considered to be at high health.

eb5656-30.name: Boon of the Shifter
description: Eterra's Blessing heals for more if you have transformed recently (last 4 seconds).

eb5656-32.name: Savage Boon
description: When Eterra's Blessing is cast on your {Wolf} or {Bear} companions, you are both granted increased physical damage for 4 seconds.

eq5s-1.name: Lethargy
description: Earthquake and its {Aftershocks} have a chance to slow enemies in their area of effect.

eq5s-2.name: Outbreak
description: Earthquake and its Aftershocks have a larger area of effect.

eq5s-3.name: Shatterquake
stats: +30% Damage Against Chilled Or Frozen Enemies
description: Earthquake and its Aftershocks deal more damage to chilled or frozen enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

eq5s-4.name: Magnitude
description: Earthquake can cast more maximum possible Aftershocks.

eq5s-5.name: Shattered Earth
description: Aftershocks have a chance when they hit to cast another Aftershock. Maximum of one additional Aftershock.

eq5s-6.name: Snowcrash
stats: 50% Chance To Cast Boulder On Aftershock Hit
description:
Aftershock hits have a chance to have an {Avalanche Boulder} cast on their location, but these Boulders cost 5 mana.

The Boulder is affected by your {Avalanche} Skill Tree.

eq5s-7.name: Divining Totem
description: Aftershocks appear around your totems instead if they are nearby.

eq5s-8.name: Torpor
description: Slows caused by Earthquake and its Aftershocks last longer.

eq5s-9.name: Buffet
description: Earthquake and its Aftershocks have an increased chance to stun enemies, and Earthquake costs less mana.

eq5s-10.name: Overwhelm
description: Casting Earthquake grants you {Haste} and {Frenzy} for a duration.

eq5s-11.name: Upheaval
description: Aftershocks are now damage over time, dealing their normal hit damage each second. Aftershocks last 3 seconds.

eq5s-12.name: Unabating
description: Aftershocks deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and last longer.

eq5s-13.name: Dust Storm
description: Aftershocks blind enemies within their area of effect.

eq5s-14.name: Crushing Wake
description: Aftershocks deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have an increased chance to stun enemies.

eq5s-15.name: Tremors
description: Earthquake can cast more minimum possible Aftershocks. Each enemy can only be targeted by one Aftershock.

eq5s-16.name: Amplitude
description: Aftershocks have a larger area of effect.

eq5s-17.name: Rupture
description: Earthquake's initial hit deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

eq5s-18.name: Potency
description: Earthquake's initial hit deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but in a smaller area.

eq5s-19.name: Ground Slam
description: Using Earthquake directly it now deals damage in a cone which has increased range. Aftershocks also favour targets in the direction Earthquake is cast.

eq5s-20.name: Seismic Smash
description: Increases to Aftershock damage on this tree apply to the initial hit, but Earthquake can no longer create Aftershocks.

eq5s-21.name: Seismic Tide
description:
Earthquake's initial hit occurs three times. First with 30% reduced radius and damage, then with 5% reduced radius and damage, then with 30% increased radius and damage.

Earthquake now has a cooldown, and each initial hit consumes mana.

eq5s-22.name: Sunder
description: Earthquake's initial hit reduces enemy armor.

eq5s-23.name: The Harder They Fall
stats: +20% Initial Hit Damage Against Rares And Bosses
description: Earthquake's initial hit deals more damage against rare and boss enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

eq5s-24.name: Cataclysm
description:
Earthquake's base damage is converted to fire damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Additionally, armor shred chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance.

eq5s-25.name: Concussion
description: Earthquake's initial hit deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to stun enemies.

eq5s-26.name: Storm Rift
description:
Earthquake is converted into a spell, and no longer scales with melee damage. Earthquake now deals substantial additional base damage on the initial hit and half of its base damage is converted to Lightning. Consequently this converted portion scales with increased lightning damage, but not with increased physical damage.

Aftershocks also deal substantial additional spell damage, but their damage is not converted to lightning.

eq5s-27.name: Thunderblight
description: Earthquake's initial hit deals additional lightning damage.

eq5s-28.name: Fury Of The Elements
description:
Casting Earthquake expends Storm Stacks over 0.5 seconds.

{Storm Bolts} triggered this way deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Storm Stacks are gained from using {Gathering Storm}. You can not expend Storm Stacks you do not have.

eq5s-30.name: Staggering Force
description: Earthquake's initial hit deals more damage and has increased stun chance and stun duration, but Earthquake has a 6 second cooldown.

eq5s-31.name: Shattered Resolve
description: Stuns caused by Earthquake and its Aftershocks last longer, but Earthquake has a longer cooldown.

eq5s-32.name: Deep Impact
description: Earthquake's initial hit can't be dodged.

er6no-2.name: Toxic Envelopment
description: Root Wave hits have a chance to poison enemies.

er6no-3.name: Venomous Briar
description: Entangling Roots' base physical damage over time is converted to poison and it now has the poison tag. Consequently this damage scales with increases to poison damage, but not increases to physical damage.
reminderText: This has no effect if you have taken the {Winternid Thorns} node.

er6no-4.name: Kobra Vines
description: Rooted enemies are also blinded.

er6no-5.name: Poisonous Seeds
description:
Entangling Roots now creates seeds in the area. When an enemy draws too close to a seed it bursts, releasing a burst of spores that slow and poison enemies.

If you have taken the {Winternid Thorns} node, the seed bursts inflict {Frostbite} and {Chill} instead of slow and poison.

er6no-6.name: Renewing Pollen
description:
The spores from {Seeds} now heal you and your allies. 

This effect is tripled for minions.

er6no-7.name: Nectar of Rejuvenation
description: Seeds now burst when an ally draws close to them which grants you and your allies the {Haste} buff, granting you 30% increased movement speed.

er6no-8.name: Earthy Puffball
description: Seeds now burst when you hit them with {Upheaval} and deal damage in a larger area when detonated this way.

er6no-9.name: Rampant Growth
description: Seeds will now grow {Vines} when they burst.
reminderText: These vines scale with your {Spriggan Form} tree as if they had been summoned by the {Summon Vines} skill.

er6no-10.name: Entrapped
description: Root Wave immobilizes enemies for a longer duration.

er6no-11.name: Inescapable Thicket
description: Root Wave cannot be dodged.

er6no-12.name: Frenzying Thorns
stats: +10% Attack Speed To Totems And Vines
+10% Cast Speed To Totems And Vines
description: Entanging Roots now wraps around your totems and vines for twice the duration as enemies, granting them additional armor and increased attack and cast speed.

er6no-13.name: Bramblewood Wardens
description: Entangling Roots now also wraps around your Spriggans for twice the duration as enemies, granting them all buffs from {Frenzying Thorns} as well as additional projectiles with their {Thorn Volley}.

er6no-14.name: Reclamation
description: Entangling Roots leeches a portion of the damage it deals as health to you.

er6no-15.name: Noxious Grasp
description: Entangling Roots deal more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: This also affects any damage over time ailments that Entangling Roots applies.

er6no-16.name: Lethal Spines
description: Entangling Roots damage accelerates over time, dealing more damage each second (multiplicative with other modifiers).

er6no-17.name: Overgrown Garden
description: You now cause Entangling Roots to expand in a circle around you rather than a cone in front, but it now has a cooldown.

er6no-18.name: Rooted System
description: Entangling Roots is now cast from the nearest totem to your cursor.

er6no-19.name: Briarthorn's Wrath
description:
When you are stunned, you now cast Entangling Roots. 

This effect has a 20 seconds cooldown, which doesn't affect Entangling Root's cooldown.

er6no-20.name: Shredding Vines
description: Root Wave hits shred enemy physical resistance.

er6no-21.name: Thick Growth
description: Root Wave's hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have a higher chance to stun enemiess.

er6no-22.name: Winternid Thorns
description:
Entangling Roots' base damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage. It also has a chance to freeze enemies.

Physical Resistance Shred from all sources is converted to Cold Resistance Shred chance and effects related to Physical Resistance Shred now depend on Cold Resistance Shred instead.

er6no-23.name: Iceshard Roots
description:
Root Wave has a chance to inflict {Frostbite}. 

Poison chance from all sources is converted to Frostbite for Root Wave and effects related to poison now depend on Frostbite instead.

er6no-24.name: Thicket of Frost
description: Root Wave gains additional freeze rate per character level.

er6no-25.name: Nourishment Surge
description:
Root Wave now heals other allies it hits. The amount of health gained is increased by healing effectiveness.

This effect is tripled for minions.

er6no-26.name: Wild Weapons
description: Root Wave causes your minions and other allies it hits to deal additional physical damage with spells and attacks for 8 seconds. This effect does not stack.

er6no-27.name: Blooming Magic
description: Root Wave causes your minions and other allies it hits to deal additional damage with spells for 8 seconds. This effect does not stack.

er6no-28.name: Bush Stalkers
stats: +4% Wolves And Bear Base Crit Chance
description: Root Wave causes your Wolves and Bear it hits to have improved base critical strile chance and deal more damage with critical strikes for 8 seconds. This effect does not stack.

er6no-29.name: Venomsting
description:
Root Wave causes your minions and other allies it hits to have additional chance to poison on hit. This buff lasts 8 seconds and does not stack.

The effect is tripled for Scorpions and Serpents.

fl13-2.name: Brutal Impact
description: Fury Leap's critical strikes deal more damage.

fl13-3.name: Regain Stamina
stats: 5% Chance To Reset Fury Leap Cooldown On Kill
description:
You have a chance to reset Fury Leap's cooldown whenever you kill an enemy with any other skill.

Fury Leap's cooldown can only be reset once every 5 seconds.

fl13-4.name: Lagon's Wrath
description: Fury Leap creates {Storm Bolts} while you are leaping.
reminderText: {Storm Bolt} is affected by your Gathering Storm tree.

fl13-5.name: Storm Bringer
description: {Storm Bolts} occur with increased frequency.

fl13-6.name: Rejuvenating Storms
stats: +1 Spell Damage Per 2 Attunement While Leaping
30% Chance For Storm Bolt To Reset Fury Leap's Cooldown
description:
You have additional spell damage per 2 Attunement while leaping, and kills with {Storm Bolt} have a chance to reset Fury Leap's cooldown.

Fury Leap's cooldown can only be reset once every 5 seconds.

fl13-7.name: Warrior's Entrance
description: When you land, you and your minions gain additional melee damage and spell damage for 3 seconds. This buff can stack.

fl13-8.name: Frenzied Onslaught
description: When you land, you and your minions gain {Frenzy} for 3 seconds, which increases attack and cast speed. Frenzy cannot stack.

fl13-9.name: Pack Leader
description: Your Wolf, Sabertooth, and Raptor companions leap with you.

fl13-10.name: Crushing Impact
description: Fury Leap has an increased chance to stun enemies and stuns it inflicts last longer.

fl13-11.name: Gravity
description: Fury Leap pulls enemies when you land.

fl13-12.name: Rise
stats: 25% Chance To Cast Summon Vines At Departure
description: Fury Leap has a chance to cast {Summon Vines} where you leap from.
reminderText:
{Summon Vines} is an active skill in Spriggan Form and can be scaled via the Spriggan Form tree.

The vines are stationary melee minions whose attacks poison on hit.

The vines scale with your bonuses to minions, but not with other nodes on this tree.

fl13-13.name: Poisonous Thicket
stats: 25% Chance To Cast Summon Vines At Arrival
description: Fury Leap has a chance to cast {Summon Vines} where you land.
reminderText:
{Summon Vines} is an active skill in Spriggan Form and can be scaled via the Spriggan Form tree.

The vines are stationary melee minions whose attacks poison on hit.

The vines scale with your bonuses to minions, but not with other nodes on this tree.

fl13-14.name: Crater
description: Fury Leap's deals damage in a larger area and costs less mana.

fl13-15.name: Ambush Predator
stats: +30% Hit Damage Against Enemies At Full Health
description: Fury Leap hits deal more damage against enemies at full health (multiplicative with other modifiers).

fl13-16.name: Savage Impact
description: Fury Leap deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and you leech a portion of the damage it deals as health.

fl13-17.name: Aspect of the Mantis
stats: Reset Fury Leap Cooldown On Short Leap Kill
description:
Fury Leap's cooldown is reset when you kill an enemy with a short leap.

Fury Leap's cooldown can only be reset once every 5 seconds.
reminderText: A short leap is less than 10 meters.

fl13-18.name: Unshackled
description: While you are below half health, Fury Leap always critically strikes.

fl13-20.name: Panther Strike
description: Fury Leap deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a shorter cooldown.

fl13-22.name: Violent Upheaval
description: When you land with Fury Leap you cast Upheaval. This consumes Upheaval's mana cost and requires positive mana.

fl13-24.name: Heorot's Protection
description: You are immune to damage while leaping.

fl13-25.name: Wind Hammer
description: Fury Leap deals more damage based on how far you leap.

fl13-26.name: Wings of Endurance
description: When you land, you and your minions are healed.
reminderText: This is affected by your Increased Healing Effectiveness stat.

fl13-27.name: Battle Bloom
description: When you land you cleanse all ailments on you and your minions.

ga2st-2.name: Looming Clouds
description: Whenever you expend a {Storm Stack} you have a chance to cast {Storm Bolt} at an additional enemy.

ga2st-3.name: Concentrated Storm
description: Gathering Storm deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and you expend {Storm Stacks} more frequently, but {Storm Bolts} target enemies within a smaller area.

ga2st-4.name: In the Eye of the Storm
description: Whenever you expend a {Storm Stack} you have a chance to cast {Maelstrom}.

ga2st-6.name: A Storm Gathers
description: Whenever you expend a {Storm Stack} you have a chance to gain a stack instead of losing one.

ga2st-7.name: Lightning Gale
description: Whenever you expend a {Storm Stack} you have a chance to gain {Haste}.

ga2st-8.name: Whirlwind Tactics
stats: 1 Expends Storm Stacks On Companion Use
description:
Whenever you use a companion ability you expend {Storm Stacks} over the next 0.3 seconds.

Storm Bolts triggered this way deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ga2st-9.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
description: Whenever you hit a boss or rare enemy with a {Storm Bolt} you have a chance to cast it again at the same enemy after 0.25 seconds.

ga2st-10.name: Lagonian Diplomacy
description: While wielding a staff the melee attack of Gathering Storm is replaced by a direct ranged cast of {Storm Bolt}, but Gathering Storm costs additional mana.

ga2st-11.name: Clouds on the Horizon
description: {Storm Bolts} target enemies from farther away.

ga2st-12.name: Friends of the Tempest
description: If you have from 1 to 15 {Storm Stacks}, your minions' lightning skill hits have a chance to grant you a {Storm Stack}.
reminderText: If Gathering Storm is converted to physical or cold then this requires a physical or cold hit instead.

ga2st-13.name: Thunderous Strikes
description: Gathering Storm penetrate enemy lightning resistance.
reminderText: If Gathering Storm is converted to physical or cold then this grants physical or cold penetration.

ga2st-14.name: Excited Bolts
description: {Storm Bolts} now consume a portion of your current mana to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 10 current mana.

ga2st-15.name: Two Eyed Storm
stats: Additional Storm Bolt While Dual Wielding
description: Whenever you expend a {Storm Stack} while dual wielding you now cast {Storm Bolts} at two enemies instead of one.

ga2st-16.name: Windfury Blows
description: Gathering Storm has increased attack speed.

ga2st-17.name: Manafused Storm
stats: 1 Mana Gain Per Storm Stack On Use
description: Whenever you directly use Gathering Storm you gain mana per active {Storm Stack} up to a maximum.

ga2st-18.name: The Typhoon
stats: 15% Increased Stun Chance Per Storm Stack
+15% Freeze Rate Multiplier Per Storm Stack
description: You have increased global stun chance and additional freeze rate multiplier per active {Storm Stack} up to a maximum.

ga2st-19.name: Energized by the Skies
description: Gathering Storm's hits have a chance to consume mana to grant you additional {Storm Stacks}.
reminderText:
This has no effect if you have no current mana.

Mana consumption happens after the mana gain from the {Manafused Storm} node.

ga2st-20.name: Island Cleaver
description: Gathering Storm's melee attack deals damage in a larger area and you have a chance to gain an additional {Storm Stack} if you hit at least 3 enemies with the same melee attack.

ga2st-21.name: Wings of Lightning
description:
Whenever you use Gathering Storm's and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of {Wings of Lightning}.

Each time one of your {Storm Crows} attack they consume a stack of Wings of Lightning causing their basic attack to chain 2 additional times.

ga2st-22.name: Jolting Strikes
description:
{Storm Bolts'} hits have chance to shock enemies.

Gathering Storm deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to shocked enemies.
reminderText: If Gathering Storm is converted to cold or physical respectively this depends on frostbite or armor shred.

ga2st-23.name: Tempest Weapon
description: Gathering Storm deals additional spell damage per 3 melee damage on your equipped axe or mace.

ga2st-24.name: Earth Smasher
description:
Gathering Storm's and {Storm Bolt's} base lightning damage is converted to physical. Consequently this damage scales with increases to physical damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance on hit from all sources is converted to armor shred chance for Gathering Storm.

Swaps Gathering Storm's {Lightning} tag for a {Physical} tag.

ga2st-25.name: Seismic Crash
description: Gathering Storm deals additional melee damage per Strength while wielding a 2 handed weapon.

ga2st-26.name: Frostbringer
description:
Gathering Storm's and {Storm Bolt's} base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage.

Shock chance on hit from all sources is converted to frostbite chance for Gathering Storm.

Swaps Gathering Storm's {Lightning} tag for a {Cold} tag.

ga2st-27.name: Of Ice and Snow
description: Gathering Storm's hits have a chance to chill enemies and a higher chance to freeze enemies.

ga2st-28.name: Winter Comes
description: Gathering Storm has a higher chance to freeze enemies per 2 Attunement and it also has additional cold penetration for frostbite per 2 Attunement.

ga2st-30.name: Rending Vortex
description: Gathering Storm has improved base critical strike chance per stack of {Maelstrom} on you from any source.

mas54-2.name: Turmoil
description: Maelstrom deals damage in a larger area.

mas54-3.name: Storm's Aid
description: You can choose to cast Maelstrom on your minions instead of yourself.

mas54-4.name: Vortex
description: Maelstrom deals more damage when cast on a totem (multiplicative with other modifiers).

mas54-5.name: Grip of Chaos
stats: 10% Chance To Summon Twisters Upon Reaching 0 Stacks
description:
When your number of Maelstrom stacks reaches 0, you have a chance to summon 2 to 4 {Twisters,} a spell that deals physical damage each second to enemies they pass through.

The number of Twisters is random, and the chance to summon them is multiplied by the highest number of stacks you reached.

mas54-6.name: Arctic Chill
description: Maelstrom has a chance to chill enemies each second.

mas54-7.name: Tsunami
description: When your number of Maelstrom stacks reaches 0, you release a {Tsunami,} a cold spell that deals damage multiplied by your highest stack count.

mas54-8.name: Typhoon
description: Maelstrom and {Tsunami} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Maelstrom stacks have a shorter duration.

mas54-9.name: Healing Winds
description: Maelstrom also heals allies in its area of effect each second.

mas54-10.name: Violent Squall
description: Maelstrom deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), has significantly increased healing effectiveness and lasts significantly longer, but you can have only one maximum stack of Maelstrom.

mas54-11.name: Eye of the Storm
description: Maelstrom deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but in a smaller area.

mas54-12.name: Arctic Blast
description: Maelstrom has an increased chance to freeze enemies each second.

mas54-13.name: Beneath The Waves
stats: 1 Extra Casts per Stack of Lagon's Slumber
description: If you go one second without directly casting Maelstrom you gain a stack of {Lagon's Slumber}. When you next cast Maelstrom directly, all stacks of {Lagon's Slumber} are consumed to cast Maelstrom an additional time per stack.

mas54-14.name: Calm
description: Maelstrom costs less mana.

mas54-15.name: Sleet-Footed
stats: 3% Increased Dodge Rating Per Maelstrom Stack
description: Each stack of Maelstrom grants you increased dodge chance.

mas54-16.name: Cyclone
stats: +1% Global More Physical Damage Per Maelstrom Stack
description:
Maelstrom's base cold damage is converted to physical. Consequently this damage scales with increases to physical damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Chill chance from this tree is converted to slow chance.

Maelstrom can no longer freeze, but each stack of Maelstrom grants global more physical damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

mas54-17.name: Whirlpool
description: Maelstrom stacks have a longer duration.

mas54-18.name: Power of the Storm
stats: Storm Bolt Cast Each Second At 6 Or More Stacks
description: While you have 6 or more stacks, you cast {Storm Bolt} at a nearby enemy each second.
reminderText: Storm Bolt scales with increased spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

mas54-19.name: Strong Tides
description: {Power of The Storm's} stack requirement is reduced.

mas54-20.name: Energized
description: {Storm Bolt} from the {Power of the Storm} node is cast at additional targets.
reminderText: Storm Bolt scales with increased spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

mas54-21.name: Turbulence
description: Maelstrom deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). This bonus is doubled if you have at least 60 Attunement.

mas54-22.name: Growing Storm
stats: +5% Chance On Kill To Cast Maelstrom
+2% Chance On Hitting Boss Or Rare
description:
You have a chance on killing an enemy or hitting a boss or rare enemy to cast Maelstrom. 

This effect has a 2 second cooldown.

mas54-23.name: Windswept
description: If you have 6 stacks of Maelstrom or more, you gain {Haste.}

mas54-24.name: Windfury
description: If you have 6 stacks of Maelstrom or more, you gain {Frenzy.}

mas54-26.name: Essence of Debris
stats: +8% Global Increased Stun Chance Per Stack
description: Each stack of Maelstrom grants you an increased chance to stun enemies.
reminderText: Maelstrom itself cannot stun, as it is a Damage Over Time Spell.

mas54-28.name: Frozen Abyss
description: Maelstrom deals more damage to chilled or frozen enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: If an enemy is chilled and frozen, both modifiers apply multiplicatively.

sa36oh-2.name: Prowling Juggernaut
description: Your sabertooth has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and recovers a percentage of its maximum health when it leaps.

sa36oh-3.name: Frozen Fur
description: Your Sabertooth has additional cold resistance and it has a chance to chill attackers that hit it.

sa36oh-4.name: Shatterhide
description: All physical damage dealt to your Sabertooth is converted to cold damage. Consequently it is reduced by cold resistance, but not by physical resistance.

sa36oh-5.name: Constitution
description: Your Sabertooth has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and increased health regeneration.

sa36oh-6.name: Camouflage
description: Your Sabertooth has additional dodge chance, and it gains more dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each point of Dexterity you have.
reminderText: This scales with your dexterity, not the dexterity of your sabertooth.

sa36oh-7.name: Savage Catalyst
description: When your Sabertooth directly uses a melee attack and hits at least one target it has a chance to use {Flurry Swipes}

sa36oh-8.name: Sabermaw
description: Your Sabertooth deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and its melee attacks have increased area.

sa36oh-9.name: Keen Senses
description: Your Sabertooth has increased critical strike chance.

sa36oh-10.name: Opportunistic Hunter
description: Your Sabertooth's critical strikes deal more damage.

sa36oh-11.name: Gauging Claws
description: Your Sabertooth's hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

sa36oh-12.name: Agile and Deadly
description: Your Sabertooth has increased attack speed.

sa36oh-13.name: Frenzy
description: Your Sabertooth has increased melee attack speed and has a chance to cause enemies to bleed, but your Sabertooth takes more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sa36oh-14.name: From the Brink
description: While your Sabertooth is on low health it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and leeches a portion of the melee damage it deals as health.
reminderText: Low health is defined as below 35% of maximum health.

sa36oh-15.name: Patient Predator
description: Your sabertooth deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sa36oh-16.name: Frost Fang
description: Your Sabertooth deals additional cold damage with spells and melee attacks.

sa36oh-17.name: Ice Tiger
description:
Your Sabertooth becomes an {Ice Tiger,} converting 100% of its base melee physical damage to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not with increases to physical damage.

The Ice Tiger's melee attacks have a Freeze Rate equal to twice their base damage.

The Ice Tiger's melee attacks' {Physical} tags are swapped for {Cold} tags.

sa36oh-18.name: Rhyme Heart
description: Your Sabertooth gains the ability to cast {Frost Nova,} a cold spell that hits all nearby enemies and has a freeze rate of 30. Frost Nova has a 10 second cooldown.
reminderText: {Frost Nova} scales with your minion's stats.

sa36oh-19.name: Ice Bringer
description:
Your sabertooth retaliates with {Ice Vortex} when it takes 70 or more damage.

Ice Vortex is a spell that deals cold damage over time in an area, and scales with your Sabertooth's increases to cold damage, spell damage, and damage over time.
reminderText: {Ice Vortex} scales with your minion's stats.

sa36oh-20.name: King of the Tundra
description: Your sabertooth has additional Freeze Rate Multiplier and it has more Freeze Rate per stack of Chill on the target (multiplicative with other modifiers)

sa36oh-21.name: Northwind
description: Your Sabertooth's cooldowns for all of its abilities are shorter.
reminderText: This includes abilities granted from this tree.

sa36oh-22.name: Heavy Paws
description: Your Sabertooth deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have an increased chance to stun enemies, but your Sabertooth can no longer leap.

sa36oh-23.name: Pounce
description: When your sabertooth leaps it uses {Flurry Swipes} when it lands.

sa36oh-24.name: Cornered Beast
stats: +100% Flurry Swipes Crit Chance if You or Your Sabertooth are below 50% Health
description: Your Sabertooth's {Flurry Swipes} inflict Bleed on hit and if you or your Sabertoth are below half health it always crits.

sa36oh-25.name: Hunter's Trail
stats: You gain Haste when your Sabertooth Leaps
description: When your sabertooth leaps you gain {Haste} for a duration

sa36oh-26.name: Snow Stalker
description: Your Sabertooth deals more damage (mutliplicative with other modifiers) per stack of {Chill} on the target.

sbf4m-2.name: Death by a Thousand Wings
description: Your Armblade Slash, Dive and {Locust} hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

sbf4m-3.name: Bloodlust Swarm
stats: 5% Locust Swarm Increased Damage Per Bleed
description:
When you create a {Locust Swarm} with Swarm Strike you consume all stacks of bleed from enemies hit by it, causing the {Swarm} to deal increased damage in a larger area per stack of bleed consumed.

The increased area scales up to a maximum.

sbf4m-4.name: Feverous Stings
description: Yours and your {Locusts'} hits have a chance to poison enemies.

sbf4m-5.name: Grand Colony
description: You can control additional {Locusts} and your Hives contain additional {Locusts}.

sbf4m-6.name: Hive Mind
stats: 1 Locusts per 3 seconds from Locust Swarm
description: Hives release {Locusts} more frequently and if you have an active {Locust Swarm} it also releases Locusts every second.
reminderText: A Locust Swarm does not lose damage or otherwise change as it releases locusts, but cannot release more Locusts than were originally gathered to create it.

sbf4m-7.name: Swarmkeeper's Call
description:
After using Summon Hive, Human Form is now replaced with {Cleanse Hives}, which releases all {Locusts} from up to 2 Hives, replaces them with {Healing Totems} and transforms you to {Spriggan Form}.

This requires you to have Spriggan Form unlocked.

sbf4m-8.name: Bountiful Hibernacula
description: When a {Hive} releases a {Locust} you regain health and {Rage}.

sbf4m-9.name: Release the Horde
description: Your Armblade Slash can now hit your own Hives which causes them to release {Locusts}.

sbf4m-10.name: Frost Bites
description:
The base damage of Swarm Strike, {Locust Swarm}, and Dive is converted to cold, and {Locusts'} base melee damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage. These attack all also gain a chance to freeze enemies.

Poison chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} chance while in Swarmblade Form.

Your {Locusts'} Poison chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} chance.

sbf4m-11.name: Chitin Sleet Storm
description: You and your {Locusts} have a higher chance of freezing enemies per point of Attunement.

sbf4m-12.name: Spiked Vespiary
description: Your Hives now cast {Thorns} as if they were {Thorn Totems}, rather than releasing {Locusts}. They can cast thorns a limited number of times equal to the number of Locusts they would have released.
reminderText: If you have the {Release the Horde} node, hitting a Hive will release thorns.

sbf4m-13.name: Locust Agility
description: You and your {Locusts} have a higher chance to dodge and additional armor while in Swarmblade Form.

sbf4m-14.name: Water Strider
description:
You cast {Maelstrom} a number of times when you Dive. 

This consumes a portion of Maelstrom's mana cost as {Rage}.

sbf4m-15.name: Springer's Fury
description: You gain {Rage} when you dodge.

sbf4m-16.name: Ironclad Beetle
description: All of your dodge rating is converted to armor while in Swarmblade Form.

sbf4m-17.name: Slashing Spiral
description: Your Swarm Strike, {Locust Swarm} and your {Locusts'} melee attacks all deal damage in a larger area.

sbf4m-18.name: Vampiric Mandibles
description: Your {Locust Swarm} leeches a portion of the damage it deals as health to you.

sbf4m-20.name: Neverending Drove
description: {Locust Swarm} lasts longer and Swarm Strike hits deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sbf4m-21.name: Swarm's Fury
description:
After using Swarm Strike, Human Form is now replaced with {Angered Swarm}, which adds 4 seconds to the duration of your {Locust Swarm} and transforms you to {Werebear Form}.

This requires you to have Werebear Form unlocked.

sbf4m-22.name: Inspiring Swarm
stats: Random Companion Ability After Swarm Strike
description: A random active companion uses its active ability after you directly use Swarm Strike.

sbf4m-23.name: Plague of Locusts
stats: +4% Poison Chance Per Locust While Swarm Active
description: Your {Locust Swarm} deals more damage per {Locust} consumed (multiplicative with other modifiers) and while the Locust Swarm is active you have additional chance to poison on hit per {Locust} consumed.

sbf4m-24.name: Earth Stinger
stats: +3 Swarm Melee Physical Damage Per Locust
description: You and your {Locusts} deal additional melee physical damage while in Swarmblade Form and your {Locust Swarm} deals additional melee physical damage per active {Locust} consumed when you use Swarm Strike.

sbf4m-25.name: Needle-Like Sting
description: You and your {Locusts} have improved base critical strike chance while in Swarmblade Form.

sbf4m-26.name: Hornet Nest
description: You can only control half as many {Locusts}, but they have significantly more health, deal significantly more damage in a larger area (all multiplicative with other modifiers) and are larger.
reminderText: The maximum number of locusts is rounded up.

sbf4m-27.name: Grasshopper's Frenzy
stats: +1 Rage Gain When You Or Locusts Crit
description: You regain {Rage} when you or your {Locusts} critically hit.

sbf4m-28.name: Viper's Call
stats: Serpent Strike Tree Affects Armblade Slashes
description:
Your {Serpent Strike} tree now applies to Armblade Slashes, and it does not require a spear.

This effect does not include the base additional poison chance or increased poison duration from Serpent Strike.

sbf4m-29.name: Endless Pressure
stats: +2 Health And Rage Gain On Kill
+2 Health And Rage Gain On Boss or Rare Hit
description: You regain health and {Rage} when you or your {Locusts} kill an enemy or when you hit a rare enemy or boss.

sbf4m-30.name: Windfury Strikes
stats: Gain Howling Cascade Stacks On Hit With Slash
description:
You gain a stack of {Howling Cascade} when you use Armblade Slash and hit at least one enemy. Reaching 6 stacks consumes them to cast {Tornado}.

This consumes Tornado's mana cost.

sbf4m-31.name: Army of the Tempest
stats: -1 Howling Cascade Stacks To Proc Tornado
description: Reduce the maximum stacks of {Howling Cascade} required to cast {Tornado}, and tornadoes cast via Howling Cascade deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sbf4m-32.name: Locust Master
description:
When you use Armblade Slashes you now summon a {Locust} instead of doing a melee attack.

Additionally when you use Armblade Slashes and hit at least one enemy, all existing Locusts gain additional melee physical damage. This buff stacks and does not expire.

sbf4m-34.name: Wasp Flight
description: You have increased attack and cast speed while in Swarmblade form.

sbf4m-35.name: Soaring Scourge
description: {Locust Swarm} now scales with your minion damage rather than your damage.

sbf4m-36.name: Carnage
stats: +2 Rage On Hit With Swarm Strike And Dive
description: Swarm Strike and Dive deal more damage and you regain {Rage} on hit with both skills.

sc36pi-1.name: Steel Carapace
description: Your Scorpion is larger and has additional physical and poison resistance

sc36pi-2.name: Venomous Maw
description: Your scorpion's attacks grant health on hit, and have a higher chance to poison on hit.

sc36pi-3.name: Envenomed Prey
description: Your Scorpion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of Poison on the target (up to 30).

sc36pi-4.name: Pinches and Pokes
description: Your Scorpion's melee attacks deal damage in a larger area, and your Scorpion is larger.

sc36pi-5.name: Blood Poisoning
description: Your Scorpion's has a chance to cause enemies to bleed, and it deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers)

sc36pi-6.name: Ironclad
description: Your Scorpion deals additional melee damage, and its Poison Chance from all sources is converted to Armour Shred Chance.

sc36pi-7.name: Maternal Instinct
description: Your Scorpion spawns a number of {Baby Scorpions} every 10 seconds. Baby Scorpions have an unlimited duration but can be killed.
reminderText:
Baby Scorpions count as minions of your Scorpion rather than your minions, but still benefit from stats that affect your minions, such as Increased Minion Damage.

Whenever your Scorpion summons baby scorpions it summons the maximum amount it can control.

sc36pi-8.name: Temper Tantrum
description: {Baby Scorpions} deal more damage (damage is multiplicative with other modifiers) and their attacks have a chance to poison enemies.

sc36pi-9.name: Sweet Release
description: Activating your Scorpion's ability summons additional {Baby Scorpions.}
reminderText: This cannot exceed your maximum number of Baby Scorpions.

sc36pi-10.name: Fertility Rites
description: {Baby Scorpions} are summoned more frequently.

sc36pi-11.name: Scurry
description: {Baby Scorpions} have increased attack and movement speed.

sc36pi-12.name: Chromatic Carapace
description: Your Scorpion has additional elemental resistance.

sc36pi-13.name: Cold-Blooded
description:
Your scorpion takes less cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

The base physical damage of your scorpion's melee attacks is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to minion cold damage, but not with increases to minion physical damage. These melee attacks now have a {Cold} tag instead of a {Physical} tag.

Your scorpion's melee attacks also gain a chance to freeze, with a freeze rate equal to twice their base damage.

sc36pi-14.name: Ice Sting
description: Your Scorpion deals more cold damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a higher chance to freeze enemies.

sc36pi-15.name: Get Over Here
description: Your Scorpion now has the ability to pull an enemy that is out of range into melee range every 8 seconds.

sc36pi-16.name: Thunder Stinger
description:
Your Scorpion's activated ability is now {Shock Nova}, a spell that deals lightning damage and applies 3 stacks of {Shock} on hit.

If you do not have the {Cold-Blooded} node the base physical damage of your scorpion's melee attacks is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to physical damage. These melee attacks now have a {Lightning} tag instead of a {Physical} tag.

sc36pi-17.name: Shock and Claw
description: Your Scorpion has a chance to {Shock} on hit and deals more lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of shock on the target.

sc36pi-18.name: Rest for the Wicked
description: Whenever your Scorpion kills an enemy, it heals for a percentage of its maximum health.

sc36pi-19.name: Frost Thorns
description: Your Scorpion can cast {Frost Thorns}, a cold spell with seeking projectiles.
reminderText: Frost Thorns are not affected by your Ice Thorns tree.

sc36pi-20.name: Noxious Carapace
description: Your Scorpion deals more poison damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sc36pi-21.name: Acid Lob
description: Your Scorpion casts {Acid Lob,} a ranged spell that explodes on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor. Acid Lob has a 6 second cooldown.

sc36pi-22.name: Miasma
description: Your scorpion's {Venom Nova} deals damage in a larger area, and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Increased poison effect multiplies poison's damage and its reduction to poison resistance.

sc36pi-23.name: Deeper Puddle
description: {Venom Nova} leaves behind a {Poison Pool} for a duration, which applies a stack of poison each second to enemies standing in the pool.

sc36pi-24.name: Pus Sacks
stats: 10% Chance To Create Poison Pool When Hit
description: Your Scorpion has a chance when it is hit to create a {Poison Pool.} This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
reminderText: Poison Pool applies a stack of poison to enemies standing in it each second.

sc36pi-25.name: Brood Invigoration
description: {Poison Pools} grant you and your minions increased attack speed and cast speed and a chance to poison enemies.

sc36pi-26.name: Winternid Jaws
description: Your scorpion has a chance to inflict {Frostbite} on hit and its Bleed Chance from all sources is converted to Frostbite Chance.

sf5rd-2.name: Overgrowth
description: {Vines} deal more damage and have more health (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

sf5rd-3.name: Creeping Underbrush
stats: +6% Summon Vine Chance On Vine Death
description: You now have a chance to summon a new Vine next to a nearby enemy when a {Vine} dies. Vines have increased attack and cast speed.

sf5rd-4.name: Blades of the Forest
description:
After using Summon Vine, Human Form is now replaced with {Infestation}, which converts your 2 nearest {Vines} into {Hives} and transforms you to {Swarmblade Form}.

This requires you to have Swarmblade Form unlocked.

sf5rd-5.name: Garden of Rage
stats: 40% Chance to Gain Rage on Vine Melee Hit
20% Chance to Gain Rage on Vine Spell Hit
description:
Your {Vines} have a chance to grant you {Rage} on hit. Melee hits have a higher chance to grant Rage than spell hits.

If you have the {Great Vine} node the rage gained is 200% higher.

sf5rd-6.name: Great Vine
description:
You can now only summon 1 {Vine} at a time up to a maximum of 6, but they have significantly more health, size, threat generation and their melee attacks deal significantly more damage in a larger area (all multiplicative with other modifiers).

Indirect casts only create a vine on every third cast.

sf5rd-7.name: Barbed Thicket
stats: +25% Chance To Cast Thorn Shield On Nearest Vine
description: You now have a chance to also cast Thorn Shield on the nearest {Vine} when you cast Thorn Shield. Other allies with Thorn Shield deal global increased physical damage and have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

sf5rd-8.name: Spikeburst
description: {Thorn Burst} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

sf5rd-9.name: Stinging Bramble
description: {Thorn Burst} and Spirit Thorn hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

sf5rd-10.name: Glacial Grove
stats: +15% Chance To Cast Maelstrom On Thorn Shield
description: You now also have a chance to cast {Maelstrom} when you directly cast Thorn Shield.

sf5rd-11.name: Ironbark
description: You have additional armor and increased armor while in Spriggan Form.

sf5rd-12.name: Deep Roots
description: Thorn Shield lasts longer.

sf5rd-13.name: Eterra's Bulwark
description: Thorn Shield grants additional armor and increased armor.

sf5rd-14.name: Introspection
stats: Thorn Shield Can Only Target You
description: Thorn Shield can now only target you and can no longer attach to other allies.
reminderText: This doesn't affect the Thorn Shield cast on other allies from the {Voice of the Thicket} node in the {Werebear} skill tree.

sf5rd-15.name: Bulb Growth
description: Thorn Shield has a chance to recast itself on the same target when it expires.

sf5rd-16.name: Briar Shell
description: Thorn Shield reflects additional flat damage to attackers.

sf5rd-17.name: Roar of the Woodland
description:
After directly casting Thorn Shield, Human Form is now replaced with {Bark Skin}, which adds 4 seconds to the duration of every Thorn Shield on you and transforms you to {Werebear Form}.

This requires you to have Werebear Form unlocked.

sf5rd-18.name: Leaf Barrier
description: You gain ward equal to your armor when you enter Spriggan Form.

sf5rd-19.name: Friend of the Forest
description:
You summon an additional {Spriggan} when you enter Spriggan Form which doesn't count towards your Spriggan limit, but does count towards your companion limit.

You will not summon an additional Spriggan if you are already at your maximum companion limit.
reminderText: Spriggan summoned this way disappears when you exit Spriggan Form.

sf5rd-20.name: Totem Warden
description: Your {Healing Totems} have more health and duration (both multiplicative with other modifiers) and you have increased summoning speed while in Spriggan Form.

sf5rd-21.name: Spiked Totems
stats: Thorn Totem Tree Benefits Healing Totems
description: Healing Totems directly cast from this tree now also shoot thorns. {Thorn Totem's} skill tree, mana cost, cooldown and totem limit also apply to Healing Totems.

sf5rd-22.name: Unbound Garden
description: You now always summon 3 Healing Totems and you can have additional maximum Healing Totems.

sf5rd-23.name: Guardian of Nature
description: Healing Totems have increased healing effectiveness.

sf5rd-24.name: Ire of Trees
description: Healing Totems are converted to Fury Totems and now restore {Rage} instead of healing, but can only affect you.
reminderText: This effect is affected by increased healing effectiveness.

sf5rd-25.name: Wrath of the Glade
description: You now have a chance to cast Spirit Thorns from each of your Healing Totems when you directly cast Spirit Thorns.

sf5rd-26.name: Rose Meadow
description: Spirit Thorns and Thorn Shield deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sf5rd-27.name: Ancestral Call
description: You gain {Rage} and ward when you directly cast Spirit Thorns and hit at least 1 enemy.

sf5rd-28.name: Branch Storm
stats: +8% Spirit Thorns Physical And Cold Penetration
description: Spirit Thorns has a chance to pierce enemies (continue through targets they hit) and they penetrate enemy physical and cold resistance.

sf5rd-29.name: Spiritwhisperer
stats: 1 Vale Spirit Every 5 Spirit Thorn Casts
description: You now summon a {Vale Spirit} every 5 direct casts with Spirit Thorns, up to a maximum.

sf5rd-30.name: Cycle of Life
stats: +20% Vale Spirit Chance On Healing Totem Death
description: Your Healing Totems have a chance to summon a {Vale Spirit} when they die.

sf5rd-31.name: Valetide
stats: Cast Entangling Roots With Spirit Thorns
description:
You can have additional maximum {Vale Spirits} and when you directly cast Spirit Thorns, while at maximum Vale Spirits, you consume them to cast {Entangling Roots} at the target area and you regain {Rage}, which deals more damage when cast this way (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This consumes Entangling Roots' mana cost.

sf5rd-32.name: Spirit Vortex
description: You have a chance to cast {Maelstrom} on you when you directly cast Spirit Thorns.

sf5rd-33.name: Nightshade
description: Your hits have a chance to poison enemies while in Spriggan Form and your Vines have a chance to poison enemies.

sf5rd-34.name: Ice Branch
description:
Spirit Thorns, Summon Vines and Thorn Shield's base physical damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage. They also have a chance to freeze enemies.

Poison chance from all sources, for all three skills, is converted to {Frostbite} and effects related to poison now depend on Frostbite instead.

sf5rd-35.name: Huntersbane
stats: Melee Attack -> Ranged Thorns For Vines
description: Your {Vines} now cast thorns from range, instead of using a melee attack. This is affected by nodes on this tree that affects Spirit Thorns, but they only fire 1 projectile and {Great Vine} fires 3 projectiles.

sf37-2.name: Reinforced Totem
