description: Frenzy Totem has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and lasts longer.

sf37-3.name: Reach
description: Frenzy Totem affects allies or enemies in a larger area.

sf37-4.name: Healing Pulse
stats: 5% Chance To Cast Eterra's Blessing While In Range
description: While in range of your Frenzy Totem, you have a chance to cast {Eterra's Blessing} on a random ally each second.

sf37-5.name: Thorn Idol
stats: 20% Percentage Of Max Health Taken Before Releasing
description: Frenzy Totem stores a portion of the damage it receives, releasing it as damage dealt to enemies after taking a percent of its maximum health in damage.
reminderText: The damage is scaled by your increased minion damage.

sf37-6.name: Improved Thorn Idol
stats: 1% Percent Of Player Damage Taken Stored By Totem
description: Frenzy Totem also stores a percentage of the damage taken by you.

sf37-7.name: Lash Out
description: Frenzy Totem has a chance to cast {Ice Thorns} when hit by enemies.

sf37-8.name: Sloth Totem
description:
Frenzy Totem is now {Sloth Totem,} which will now slow and reduce the armor of enemies instead of granting Frenzy.

Increased effect of frenzy is converted to increased effect of armor shred.

sf37-9.name: Grounded
stats: Frenzy Totem Summoned 1m In Front Of Player
description:
Frenzy Totem is no longer summoned at your cursor; instead it is always placed 1 meter in the direction you're facing.

Frenzy Totem costs less mana and grants additional melee damage.

sf37-10.name: Dig In
description: You are tethered to the totem while you remain within 5 meters of it, and while tethered you deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: The range of the tether is not affected by Increased Area for Area Skills stats.

sf37-11.name: Totemic Reach
description: Frenzy Totem's tether has a higher range.

sf37-13.name: Dig Deep
description: You have additional critical strike multiplier while tethered.

sf37-14.name: Revitalizing Totem
description: Allies affected by Frenzy Totem are granted increased health regeneration.

sf37-15.name: Symbol of Haste
description: When you summon Frenzy Totem, you and your companions are granted {Haste} for a duration (doubled for companions).

sf37-16.name: Symbol of Selflessness
description: Frenzy Totem's buffs are more effective, but Frenzy Totem now affects only companions.

sf37-17.name: Warding Totem
description: Companions affected by Frenzy Totem have higher physical and elemental resistance.

sf37-18.name: Mortuary Totem
description: While affected by Frenzy Totem, you revive downed companions faster.

sf37-19.name: Invigorated Renewal
stats: Healing Nova Cast When Companion Is Revived
description: Whenever you revive a downed companion, Frenzy Totem casts {Healing Nova.}
reminderText: The area of the Healing Nova is affected by Increased Area for Area Skills stats.

sf37-20.name: Venomous Intent
description: Allies affected by Frenzy Totem are granted a chance to poison enemies.

sf37-22.name: Rabidity
description: Frenzy Totem's Frenzy buff is more effective.

sf37-23.name: Reckless Frenzy
description: When you summon Frenzy Totem you gain a temporary buff that grants you more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and increased melee attack speed, but also increases the damage you take.

sf37-24.name: Bestial Frenzy
description: When you summon Frenzy Totem, your companions are granted additional melee physical damage for 4 seconds.

sf37-25.name: Furious Cry
description: Summoning Frenzy Totem refreshes companion ability cooldowns.

sf37-26.name: Maim
description: While Frenzy Totem is active, your Sabertooth's {Flurry Swipes} casts an additional time when used.

sf37-28.name: Lead The Pack
stats: 50% Increased Critical Strike Chance Granted By Wolf Howl
description: While Frenzy Totem is active, your Wolves' howls also grant increased critical strike chance to you and your allies.

sf37-29.name: Venom Spray
description: While Frenzy Totem is active, your Scorpion's {Venom Nova} hits in a larger area.

sp38-2.name: Briar Summoner
description:
Your Spriggan can now use {Summon Vine}, melee minions that poison enemies they hit, up to a maximum of 6 Vines.

These Vines are not affected by your Vine limit or nodes on the {Spriggan Form} tree.

sp38-3.name: Vine Mastery
description: Your Spriggan's Summon Vine ability has a shorter cooldown.

sp38-4.name: Deadly Thicket
description: Your Spriggan's summoned {Vines} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-5.name: Forest Raiser
description: Your Spriggan's {Summon Vine} ability now summons three vines at a time, but has a significantly longer cooldown (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-6.name: Attuned Vines
description: Your Spriggan's summoned {Vines} have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and additional poison resistance.

sp38-7.name: Floral Ascendance
description: Your Spriggan deals more spell damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-8.name: Thorn Barrage
description: Your Spriggan's {Thorn Volley} has a chance to fire 2 extra Thorns.

sp38-9.name: Barbed Assault
description: Your Spriggan's {Thorn Volley} always fires 1 extra Thorn and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-10.name: Brutal Mire
stats: +40% Thorn Hit Damage To Immobilized Enemies
+40% Thorn Hit Damage To Stunned Enemies
+40% Thorn Hit Damage To Frozen Enemies
description: Your Spriggan's {Thorn Volley} hits deal more damage to immobilized, stunned or frozen enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-11.name: Vile Bramble
stats: +20% Thorn Hit Damage To Poisoned Enemies
description: Your Spriggan's {Thorn Volley} hits deal more damage to poisoned enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-12.name: Aura of Life
description: Your Spriggan's {Healing Aura} and {Rejuvenating Wind} restore more health.

sp38-13.name: Aura of Kinship
description: Your Spriggan's {Healing Aura} now also grants allies additional spell damage.

sp38-14.name: Aura of Retribution
description: Your Spriggan's {Healing Aura} now also grants allies additional base critical chance and critical strike avoidance.

sp38-15.name: Arboreal Vitality
description: Your Spriggan has more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-16.name: Warding Bark
description: Your Spriggan has additional armor and physical resistance.

sp38-17.name: Creeping Roots
description: Your Spriggan can now cast {Ensnaring Roots}, a wave of roots deals physical damage and roots enemies it hits for 1.5 seconds. Rooted enemies take physical damage over time until they are freed.

sp38-18.name: Barbed Roots
description: Your Spriggan's {Ensnaring Roots} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sp38-20.name: Branches of Winter
description:
Thorn Volley's and Ensnaring Roots' base physical damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage. They also have a chance to freeze enemies.

Poison chance from all sources, for both skills, is converted to {Frostbite} and effects related to poison now depend on Frostbite instead.

sp38-21.name: Protective Roots
description: Your Spriggan now casts {Ensnaring Roots} towards you whenever there are enemies around you, rather than it casting towards enemies near itself.

sp38-22.name: Natureâ€™s Reach
description: Your Spriggan's {Ensnaring Roots} has a shorter cooldown.

sp38-23.name: Lasting Roots
description: Your Spriggan's {Ensnaring Roots} lasts longer.

sp38-24.name: Aura of Loyalty
description: Your Spriggan's {Healing Aura} restores significantly more health to minions.

sp38-25.name: Frostleaf
description: Your Spriggan has a higher chance to freeze enemies. Your Spriggans Aura grants its allies a higher chance to freeze enemies.

sp38-26.name: Aura of Evasion
description:
Your Spriggan's {Healing Aura} now also grants allies additional dodge rating per point of your Attunement.

This effect is doubled on minions.

sp38-27.name: Garden of Nourishment
description: Your Spriggan's {Ensnaring Roots} now heals allies it hits.

sp38-28.name: Invading Underbrush
description: Your Spriggan's {Ensnaring Roots} can no longer be dodged.

sp38-29.name: Thorny Stalks
description: While you control a Spriggan, you and your Spriggans reflect flat damage to attackers per point of Vitality.

srtor-2.name: Iridescent Plumage
description: Your Raptor has additional elemental resistance and have additional dodge chance.

srtor-3.name: Screech
description: Your Raptor gains the ability to {Screech} at enemies, shredding their physical resistance. Screech has a 10 second cooldown.

srtor-4.name: Earsplitting Roar
description: {Screech} has increased cooldown recovery speed and causes enemies it hits to {Bleed}.

srtor-7.name: Brilliant Display
stats: Raptor Reduces Other Minion Cooldowns Every 8 Seconds
description: Your Raptor automatically reduces the cooldown of your other companions' activatable abilities by 3 seconds. This effect has an 8 second cooldown.

srtor-8.name: Razor Wings
description: Your Raptor deals additional melee physical damage.

srtor-9.name: Thrill of the Hunt
description: When your Raptor kills an enemy, it gains {Haste} for 4 seconds.

srtor-10.name: Adaptation
description: If your Raptor has 10 kills in this zone it evolves, gaining 15% more size and damage while you remain in the zone (damage multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Using a town portal will reset this buff even if you return to the same zone.

srtor-11.name: Taste for Flesh
description: Your Raptor gains more damage for 10 seconds when it kills an enemy (multiplicative with other modifiers). This effect can stack.

srtor-12.name: Scent of Blood
description: Your Raptor deals more damage to bleeding targets (multiplicative with other modifiers).

srtor-13.name: In for the Kill
stats: 4% Melee Damage Per Nearby Bleeding Enemy
description: Your Raptor gains more melee damage for each nearby bleeding enemy (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Nearby is 6 meters.

srtor-14.name: Ravage
description: Raptor deals more critical strike damage and has a higher chance to critically strike against bleeding targets (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

srtor-15.name: Tear Flesh
description: Your Raptor's melee attacks have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

srtor-16.name: Sharp Claws
description: Your Raptor deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

srtor-17.name: Acidic Bile
description: Your Raptor gains the ability to cast {Poison Spit,} blinding the enemy and applying stacks of poison. 8 second cooldown.
reminderText: Blinded enemies have 50% less critical hit chance and are less accurate at range. Does not stack.

srtor-18.name: Infected Wounds
description: Whenever your Raptor hits a bleeding enemy with a melee attack, its next melee attack has additional slow chance based on the number of bleed stacks on that enemy.
reminderText: At 2 points invested, your Raptor gains 100% melee slow chance when hitting an enemy with 2 stacks of bleed.

srtor-19.name: Dripping Blood
stats: 25% Chance On Hit To Double Bleed Speed
description: When you Raptor hits an enemy, bleeds on that enemy have a 25% chance to double in speed.

srtor-20.name: Cornered
stats: +1% Damage For Each % Of Missing Health
description: Your Raptor deals more damage for each percent of its missing health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: At 2 points, this node gives the Raptor 198% more damage while it is at 1% health.

srtor-21.name: Broken Tooth
stats: 10% Chance To Lose 10% Of Current Health On Melee Attack
description: Your Raptor has increased melee attack speed, but has a 10% chance to lose 10% of its current health on melee attack.

srtor-22.name: Vicious Rampage
description: Your Raptor gains increased effect from {Rampage.}
reminderText: Does not increase the size gain from Rampage.

srtor-23.name: Predator
description: Your Raptor has increased chance to critically strike.
reminderText: Base critical strike chance is 5%

srtor-24.name: Vexation
description: {Rampage} lasts longer.

srtor-25.name: Eager
description: {Rampage} costs less mana.

srtor-26.name: Challenger
stats: Raptor Rampages Near Rares And Bosses
description: Your Raptor uses {Rampage} if it encounters a rare or boss minion, if it is able to.

srtor-27.name: Primal Rage
description: {Rampage} fears enemies when it is activated.

srtor-28.name: Menacing Aura
description: While your Raptor is {Rampaging,} enemies within 5 meters of it have a chance to be slowed each second.

ssc50-0.name: Summon Storm Crows
description: Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

ssc50-1.name: Avis
description: Storm Crows have increased cast speed, movement speed and more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ssc50-2.name: Shredding Beaks
description: Storm Crows hits have a chance to shred enemy armor.

ssc50-3.name: Murder of Crows
description: Storm Crows deal more damage per active crow (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ssc50-4.name: Feathered Storm
description: Storm Crows hits have a chance to shred enemy armor per point of strength, and armor shred they apply has increased effectiveness per point of strength.

ssc50-5.name: Huntsman
description: Your melee hits have a 20% chance to grant active Storm Crows more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for 10 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

ssc50-6.name: Shocking Display
description: Storm Crows have a chance to shock enemies and have additional lightning resistance.

ssc50-7.name: Thundering Strike
description: {Crowstorm} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to stun enemies.

ssc50-8.name: Nimbleness
description: Storm Crows have additional dodge chance and increased dodge chance.

ssc50-9.name: Expansive Pulse
description: {Crowstorm} deals damage in a larger area and has a chance to shock enemies it hits.

ssc50-10.name: Frigid Wings
description:
Storm Crows' base lightning damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage. It also has a chance to freeze enemies.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} chance and effects related to shock now depend on Frostbite instead.

ssc50-11.name: Arctic Breath
description: Storm Crows have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

ssc50-12.name: Storm Breath
description: Storm Crows deal more spell damage per stack of shock on the target (multiplicative with other modifiers), up to a maximum.

ssc50-13.name: Fulminating Caw
description: Your increases to lightning damage also apply to your Storm Crows, but at reduced effectiveness.
reminderText:
Elemental damage increases and increases that don't have a specific damage type also apply to the crows' lightning damage.

This node has no effect on non-lightning damage, even if the crows' damage type is converted.

ssc50-14.name: Thunderstruck
description: Storm Crows' basic lightning spell has a chance to chain to up to 2 additional targets.

ssc50-15.name: Shatterbolt
description: Storm Crows deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have increased critical strike chance.

ssc50-16.name: Pincers
description: Storm Crows' critical strikes deal more damage.

ssc50-17.name: Observe and Learn
description: Your melee hits have a 20% chance to improve active Storm Crows' base critical strike chance for 10 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

ssc50-18.name: Charged Feathers
description: Storm Crows' basic lightning spell deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each second they spent moving since their previous attack, up to a maximum duration.

ssc50-19.name: Winged Raptor
description: You can now only have 1 Storm Crow, it deals more damage, has more health (both multiplicative with other modifiers) and is larger.

ssc50-20.name: Power Claw
description: Storm Crows' basic lightning spell deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but now consumes your mana.
reminderText: This effect does not work if you are out of mana.

ssc50-21.name: Aspect of the Crow
description: Storm Crow hits have a chance to grant you a stack of {Aspect of the Crow} for 8 seconds, granting you additional melee and spell lightning damage per stack.

ssc50-22.name: Navigator
stats: Aspect of the Crow On Other Companions
description: Your non-crow companions gain {Aspect of the Crow} when you do, but it has 50% reduced duration on them.

ssc50-23.name: Goodberries
description:
Storm Crows fly to your companions below half health to heal them. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

The amount of healing is increased by healing effectiveness.

ssc50-24.name: Silverberries
description:
{Goodberries} now also grants the companion ward. 

The amount of ward gained is increased by healing effectiveness.

ssc50-25.name: Forager
description: Storm Crows are able to use {Goodberries} more frequently.

ssc50-26.name: Winds of Restoration
description: Storm Crows can now also fly to and heal you with {Goodberries}.
reminderText: This also takes the effect of the {Silverberries} node.

ssc50-27.name: Wisdom of the Storm
stats: Wisdom of the Storm On Allies
description:
Every 10 seconds Storm Crows cast {Wisdom of the Storm} on its nearest ally, granting it {Aspect of the Crow}. 

This effect has 50% reduced duration on minions.

ssc50-28.name: Ornithology
description: You are granted additional Intelligence per active Storm Crow.

ssc50-29.name: Arborist
stats: Wisdom of the Storm On Totems
description: {Wisdom of the Storm} no longer has a cooldown, but can now only target totems.

ssc50-30.name: Sky Passage
description:
When you directly cast {Crowstorm} you and your crows are teleported to the target location if it is accessible.

Crowstorm now counts as a {Traversal} skill.
reminderText: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

ssc50-31.name: Thunderous Blast
description: {Crowstorm} deals more damage per contributing Crow (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a shorter cooldown.
reminderText: The damage bonus from Thunderous Blast is additive with Crowstorm's baseline more damage per contributing Crow.

st31et-2.name: Primal Serpent
stats: 2% Summon Chance on Rare or Boss Hit
description: When Serpent Strike kills an enemy or hits a rare or boss enemy, you have a chance to summon a {Primal Serpent}.

st31et-3.name: Culling Point
description: Serpent Strike hits have a chance to instantly kill enemies that are below a threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).
reminderText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.

st31et-4.name: Coldfang
description: Serpent Strike hits have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

st31et-5.name: Serpent Venom
description: Serpent Strike hits have a chance to inflict {Serpent Venom}, an ailment that deals poison damage over time and prevents enemies from landing critical strikes. It lasts 3 seconds and cannot stack.

st31et-6.name: Spirit Viper
stats: 1 Mana Gain with at least 50 Vitality
description: Serpent Venom deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on your Vitality, and if you have 50 Vitality you regain mana when you inflict an enemy with Serpent Venom or refresh its duration.

st31et-7.name: Poison Tipped
description: Serpent Strike hits have a higher chance to poison on hit and they deal more melee damage per stack of poison on the target, up to a limit.

st31et-8.name: Venemous Union
stats: 2 Venom Novas on Lunge (12 Second Cooldown)
description:
When you lunge forwards with Serpent Strike, if you have a {Scorpion} it casts its companion ability, {Venom Nova}, twice, once centred on itself, and once centred on you.

This effect has a 12 second cooldown, but ignores Venom Nova's regular cooldown and does not put it on cooldown.

st31et-9.name: Cobra Lunge
stats: Lunge if Slightly Out of Range
description: When you attempt to use Serpent Strike against a target that is slightly out of range you will lunge forwards before attacking.

st31et-10.name: Constrictor
description: You gain a stack of {Constrictor} every 0.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 4. When you use Serpent Strike all stacks are consumed causing the attack to deal more damage per stack (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: The stacks are not multiplicative with each other.

st31et-11.name: Mussurana
description: Each stack of {Constrictor} also grants Serpent Strike additional poison chance and increased poison duration when consumed

st31et-12.name: Sapping Coils
description: You regain mana when you consume a stack of {Constrictor}.

st31et-13.name: Slither
description:
You gain {Slither} for 4 seconds when you use Serpent Strike and hit at least one enemy.

Each stack grants you more dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st31et-14.name: Gouging Spear
description: Serpent Strike hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

st31et-15.name: Hydra Strikes
description: Serpent Strike has increased attack speed.

st31et-16.name: Corrosive Venom
description: Serpent Strike hits have a chance to shred enemy armor and posion resistance.

st31et-17.name: Devour Prey
description: You regain health when Serpent Strikes kills or critically strikes an enemy.

st31et-18.name: Eye of the Viper
description: Serpent Strike's critical strikes deal more damage.

st31et-20.name: Frostwyrm's Fury
description:
Serpent Strike now has a chance to freeze and its base physical damage is converted to cold damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to Frostbite chance.

st31et-21.name: Vicious Strikes
stats: 10 Primal Serpent Health Granted On Melee Hit
description: {Primal Serpents} have increased melee attack speed and are granted health when they hit enemies with a melee attack.

st31et-22.name: Iron Scales
description: {Primal Serpents} have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and additional armour

st31et-23.name: Emerald Fangs
description: {Primal Serpents}'s hits have an additional chance to poison enemies and inflict {frailty}.

st31et-24.name: Guardian Spear
description: Instead of summoning a new serpent when the {Primal Serpent} node's effect triggers, you heal your current serpent to full health and it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for 10 seconds. This damage buff can stack.
reminderText: This effect triggers when you kill an enemy and roll to summon.

st31et-26.name: Biting Winds
description: Frosbite inflicted by Serpent Strike lasts longer and has additional cold penetration

st31et-27.name: Shroud of Winter
description: You have additional dodge rating per cold resistance, for each stack of the {Slither} buff.

st31et-28.name: Swirling Carnage
description: Each active stack of {Maelstrom} grants Serpent Strike additional Chance to Bleed on Hit and more damage damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st31et-29.name: Steel Eater
description: Armour Shred inflicted by Serpent Strike has an increased effect based on your Dexterity.

st31et-30.name: Shattered Immunity
stats: +1% Serpent Venom Damage Per Frostbite Stack
description:
Serpent Venom deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on the number of poison and frostbite stacks on them.

These effects are doubled against enemies at high health.

st31et-31.name: Fast Acting Toxins
stats: +2% Serpent Venom Damage per Melee Crit Chance
+100% Serpent Venom Speed with >50% Melee Crit Chance
description:
Serpent Venom deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on your melee critical strike chance.

If your melee crit chance is above 50% then Serpent Venom deals its damage twice as quickly. This does not increase the total damage it deals over its full duration, but rather halves its duration and doubles its damage per second.

st31et-32.name: Dread Fang
description: Ailments applied by Serpent Strike and {Primal Serpents} have additional poison penetration.

st38ml-2.name: Static Field
description: Storm Totem attacks have a chance to shock enemies.

st38ml-3.name: Exploit Weaknesses
description: Storm Totem hits deal more damage to shocked enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st38ml-4.name: Press Your Advantage
stats: 10% More Crit Chance Against Shocked Enemies
description: Storm Totem has more critical strike chance against shocked enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st38ml-5.name: Fulgurite Core
stats: +1 Spell Lightning Damage per 10% Shock Chance
+1 Spell Lightning Damage per 10% Chance to Shock Attackers
description: Storm Totem has additional Spell Lightning Damage based on your Shock Chance and your Chance to Shock Attackers.
reminderText: The totem's shock chance and your shock chance for minions are not taken into account, just your own shock chance. The same applies for the chance to shock attackers.

st38ml-6.name: Overstimulation
description: Enemies hit by Storm Totem recently have reduced movement speed.

st38ml-7.name: Stormrider
description: You have increased movement speed if Storm Totem has hit a shocked an enemy recently (last 4 seconds).

st38ml-8.name: Grounding Conduit
description: You deal increased lightning damage if a Storm Totem has hit a shocked an enemy recently.

st38ml-9.name: Shielding Totem
description: Allies near your Storm Totem have additional lightning resistance.

st38ml-10.name: Steel Plating
description: Storm Totem has increased health.

st38ml-11.name: Heavy Impact
description: Storm Totem hits have an increased chance to stun enemies and the stuns they inflict last longer.

st38ml-12.name: Limited Resistance
description: Storm Totem costs less mana to summon.

st38ml-13.name: Lightning Raider
description: Storm Totem has more cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st38ml-14.name: Direct Current
description: Improves Storm Totem's base critical strike chance.

st38ml-15.name: Power Shunt
description: Storm Totem critical strikes deal more damage.

st38ml-16.name: Blizzard
description:
Storm Totem now creates a {Blizzard} around itself; enemies caught in the blizzard take cold damage over time and have a 25% chance to be chilled each second.

All shock chance is converted to chill chance. All effects which are conditional on shock are conditional on chill instead.

st38ml-17.name: Icicles
description: Storm Totem deals additional cold spell damage.

st38ml-18.name: Chill to the Bone
description: Storm Totem hits have a chance to chill enemies.

st38ml-19.name: Frostbite
description: {Blizzard} has a chance to inflict enemies with {Frostbite} each second.

st38ml-20.name: Piercing Winds
description: {Frostbite} inflicted by {Blizzard} has additional Cold Penetration.

st38ml-21.name: Storm's Reach
description: Storm Totem's individual lightning strikes damage enemies in a larger area
reminderText: If you have the {Blizzard} node this affects the area of the blizzard.

st38ml-22.name: Shockfury
description: Allies near your Storm Totem are granted additional melee lightning damage.

st38ml-23.name: Discharge
description: Storm Totem casts {Lightning Nova} when it dies.
reminderText: {Lightning Nova} scales with your minion's stats.

st38ml-24.name: Intensity
description: Storm Totem deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but cost more mana.

st38ml-25.name: Thunder Totem
stats: +20% Thunder Totem Damage, Health, Duration And Size Per Totem
description:
If you have at least 3 other totems when you summon Storm Totem, up to 5 are consumed to instead summon a {Thunder Totem} which has more damage, duration, health and size per totem consumed this way (all multiplicative with other modifiers).

This effect does not consume other Storm Totems or Thunder Totems.

st38ml-26.name: Unmatched Storms
stats: Storm Bolts Instead Of Lightning Strikes
description: Your Storm Totem now casts {Storm Bolts} from your {Gathering Storm} instead of its own lightning strikes, but Storm Totem has significantly less cast speed.
reminderText: The Storm Bolts benefit from your Storm Totem tree and your {Gathering Storm} tree.

sw43-2.name: Claws of the Bear
description: Swipe deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and slows enemies, but has a cooldown.

sw43-3.name: Twin Fangs
description: While you have {Aspect of the Panther} you have additional critical strike multiplier per Stack. This bonus is doubled if you are dual wielding.

sw43-4.name: Blood Beast
description: Swipe hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

sw43-5.name: Rending
description: Swipe has a chance to shred physical resistance on hit.

sw43-6.name: Duality of Nature
description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you gain health if you are transformed, or mana if you are not transformed.
reminderText: This effect cannot be triggered by Claw Totems or other minions using Swipe.

sw43-7.name: Culling
description:
Swipe hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health). 

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.

sw43-8.name: Sabertooth's Endurance
stats: Aspect of the Panther affects Sabertooth
description:
Each stack of {Aspect of the Panther} lasts longer and grants increased health regen.

Aspect of the Panther also applies to your {Sabertooth} if you have one.
reminderText: This effect does not apply to your Sabertooth if triggered by Claw Totem or other minion using Swipe.

sw43-9.name: Storm Claw
description:
Swipe deals more lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Every 3 seconds, your next Swipe deals damage in a larger area and has its base damage converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not with increases to physical damage.

Swipe gains a {Lightning} tag.

sw43-10.name: Lagon's Fury
stats: Storm Claw Cooldown Reset on Totem Summon
description: The cooldown for the effect of the {Storm Claw} node is reset if you summon a Totem.

sw43-11.name: Umjol's Guidance
description:
Swipe has a chance to shock on hit and a portion of Swipe's base damage is converted to Lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not with increases to physical damage.

If you have 5 points in this node, Swipe loses its {Physical} tag.

sw43-12.name: Storm Scour
description: Swipe has additional lightning penetration based on your Attunement

sw43-13.name: Way of the Hunt
description: Swipe deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and leeches a portion of damage dealt as health.

sw43-14.name: Claws of Stone
stats: 10% Chance To Summon Claw Totem On Kill
description: You have a chance to summon a {Claw Totem} when Swipe kills an enemy.

sw43-15.name: Aspect of the Panther
description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Aspect of the Panther. Each stack lasts 4 seconds and grants you more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Stacks are not multiplicative with each other, i.e. 2 stacks gives 10% more damage, not 10.25%.

sw43-16.name: Lion's Strength
stats: +1 Maximum Aspect of the Panther Stacks
description: Aspect of the Panther can have more stacks and each stack grants you additional melee damage.

sw43-17.name: Wild Calling
description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to call forth a {Spirit Wolf} from each of your summoned wolves.
reminderText: This effect cannot be triggered by Claw Totems or other minions using Swipe.

sw43-18.name: Lupine Attunement
description: When you attack with Swipe and hit at least one enemy you call forth a {Spirit Wolf} from each of your summoned wolves.
reminderText: This effect cannot be triggered by Claw Totems or other minions using Swipe.

sw43-19.name: Feline Hunter
description: While you have {Aspect of the Panther} you have increased attack and cast speed. This does not scale with the number of stacks.

sw43-20.name: Wrath of the Wild
description: Swipe deals more Lightning Damage per stack of Shock on the target and more Cold Damage per stack of Chill on the target.
reminderText: These effects are multiplicative with each other and with other modifiers.

sw43-21.name: Wengarian Reach
description: Swipe deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

sw43-22.name: Primal Resonance
stats: 100% Nearest Companion Health Restored on Hit
description: When you use Swipe and hit at least one enemy your nearest companion uses its companion ability and is restored to full health.
reminderText:
This does not require the companion's ability to be off cooldown and does not put it on cooldown or invoke its mana cost.

Downed companions are excluded.

This effect cannot be triggered by Claw Totems or other minions using Swipe.

sw43-23.name: Avatar of Stone
description: When you use Swipe and hit at least one enemy, all your totems gain +1 Melee Damage and +1 Spell Damage. This buff stacks and lasts until the totems expire.
reminderText: This effect cannot be triggered by Claw Totems or other minions using Swipe.

sw43-24.name: Trapper
description: Swipe hits deal more damage against slowed enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers)

th39-2.name: Forested Expanse
description: You can have additional Thorn Totems active, but Summon Thorn Totem costs more mana.

th39-3.name: Grove Mind
stats: Totems Summoned In Ring At Location
+15 Mana Cost Per Additional Totem Summoned
description: You summon your maximum number of Thorn Totems at once in a ring around the target location, but your maximum number of Thorn Totems is reduced and Summon Thorn Totem costs additional mana per additional totem summoned.
reminderText: Thorn totems that would be created in innaccessible locations are not created at all, but still increase the mana cost.

th39-4.name: Memories of Eterra
description: You regain mana when a Thorn Totem dies or is unsummoned.
reminderText: You can only regain mana from Thorn Totems that were summoned directly.

th39-5.name: Totemic Wisdom
description: Summon Thorn Totem costs less mana.

th39-6.name: Venom Tipped Thorns
description: Thorn Totem hits have a chance to poison enemies.

th39-7.name: Rotten Core
description:
When Thorn Totems die or are unsummoned they release a {Poison Burst}, which deals a small amount of physical spell damage on hit and inflicts poison.

Thorn Totem gains a {Poison} tag, but this does not affect the damage type of Thorn Totems' other abilities.
reminderText: If you have the {Pillars of Heorot} node, 100% of Poison Burst's hit damage is converted to cold.

th39-8.name: Lasting Affliction
description: Poison and Frostbite inflicted by Thorn Totem last longer.

th39-9.name: Pillars of Heorot
description:
Thorn Totem's thorns gain a chance to freeze and 100% of their base physical damage is converted to cold damage. Consequently its damage now scales with your totems' increases to cold damage instead of physical damage.

All poison chance is converted to frostbite chance for Thorn Totems.

Thorn Totems have additional cold resistance.
reminderText: Freeze rate grants a chance to freeze based on the enemy's health.

th39-10.name: Frost Attunement
stats: +5% Freeze Rate Multiplier Per Point Of Attunement
description: Thorn Totem has a higher chance to freeze enemies, and a greater chance to freeze enemies for each point of Attunement you have.
reminderText: This scales with your attunement, not the attunement of your totems.

th39-11.name: Winterwood
description: Thorn Totem deals additional spell cold damage, including its own thorns.

th39-12.name: On Astral Winds
description: Thorn Totems deal more spell damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but their projectiles travel more slowly.

th39-13.name: Torrent of Thorns
description: Thorn Totems have a chance to release twice as many thorns with each burst.

th39-14.name: Titan's Bane
stats: +10% Thorn Hit Damage vs Rares and Bosses
description: Thorn Totems fire only one thorn with each burst, but they have massively increased cast speed, are more accurate with their thorns, and their thorns' hits deal more damage to rare enemies and bosses (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Torrent of Thorns} can still double the number of thorns in each burst to 2.

th39-15.name: Spriggans' Wrath
description: Thorn Totem's thorns can pierce enemies up to a maximum

th39-16.name: Ancient Power
description: Thorn Totem deals more damage, but has less cast speed (both multiplicative with other modifiers).

th39-17.name: Impale
description: Thorn Totem's thorns have a chance to deal double damage on hit.

th39-18.name: Shred Armor
description: Thorn Totem hits have a chance to shred enemy armor.

th39-19.name: Winged Thorns
description: Thorn Totem's thorns travel faster and farther.

th39-20.name: Frenetic Attunement
description: You summon Thorn Totem faster and all Thorn Totems have increased cast speed.

th39-21.name: Oaken Protection
description: Thorn Totems have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and additional physical resistance.

th39-22.name: Guided Thorns
description: Thorn Totem's thorns now seek nearby targets, but Thorn Totem has less cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: This doesn't change the fact that multiple thorns cannot hit the same target

th39-23.name: Eternal Forest
description: Thorn Totems last longer and have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers)

th39-24.name: Lethal Thicket
description: Thorn Totems have an increased critical strike chance and deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

th39-25.name: Nightshade Briar
description: Thorn Totem's thorn hits deal more damage per stack of poison on the target (multiplicative with other modifiers) up to a maximum.
reminderText:
At 20 or more stacks this grants 80% more hit damage.

If you have taken the {Pillars of Heorot} node, this node's effect depends on the number of Frostbite stacks on the target instead of the number of poison stacks.

to50-2.name: Lasting Storm
description: Tornado lasts longer.

to50-3.name: Strength of Air
description: Tornado has increased pull strength.

to50-4.name: Hurricane
description: When you use Tornado, you have a chance to create an additional Tornado, but Tornadoes have reduced pull strength.

to50-5.name: Charged Storm
description: Tornado casts {Storm Bolt} at a nearby enemy every 2 seconds.
reminderText: Storm Bolt scales with increased spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

to50-6.name: Frequent Lightning
description: Tornado casts {Storm Bolt} more frequently.
reminderText: Storm Bolt scales with increased spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

to50-7.name: Debris
description: Tornado deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but costs more mana.

to50-8.name: Fire Tornado
description:
Tornados' base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Tornado deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Fire tornado scales with increases to fire damage, not physical damage.

to50-9.name: Druidic Control
description: Tornado is now stationary, but deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

to50-10.name: Eye of the Storm
stats: Can No Longer Cast Additional Tornadoes
description: Tornado deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and attach to you wherever you move, but you can no longer cast additional Tornadoes at once.

to50-11.name: Overcast Skies
description: {Storm Bolts} target enemies from further away.
reminderText: Storm Bolt scales with increased spell damage and lightning damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

to50-12.name: Churning Orbs
description: Tornado now create a {Storm Orb} every second, but Tornado has less cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Storm orbs explode after one second dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.\n\nStorm orbs scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

to50-13.name: Trail of Storms
description: Tornadoes cast {Storm Orbs} more frequently.

to50-14.name: Igniting Swirl
description: Tornado ignites nearby enemies every 2 seconds.

to50-15.name: Inferno
description: Tornado ignites nearby enemies more frequently.

to50-16.name: Stormbringer
description: Tornado has an increased cast speed.

to50-17.name: Aspect of the Storm
description: Casting Tornado grants {Aspect of the Storm} for 2 seconds, which grants 10% increased movespeed.
reminderText: You can only have one instance of Aspect of the Storm at once.

to50-18.name: Storm Dervish
stats: +7% Aspect of the Storm Attack Speed
+7% Aspect of the Storm Cast Speed
description: {Aspect of the Storm} now also grants increased attack and cast speed.

to50-19.name: Gust of Renewal
stats: +3% Aspect of the Storm Mana Regen
description: Tornado costs less mana, and {Aspect of the Storm} grants increased mana regeneration.

to50-20.name: Swift Wings
description: {Aspect of the Storm} lasts longer.

to50-21.name: Snap Gale
description: Tornado is now instant cast and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but now has a 4 second cooldown.

to50-22.name: Storm Soul
description: Tornado has a shorter cooldown and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ts85i-2.name: Lagonian Shamanism
description: You now have a chance to gain a stack of {Gladiator of Lagon} when you cast a {Tempest}.
reminderText: This effect can still only trigger a maximum of 3 times per second.

ts85i-3.name: Tempestuous Legend
description:
{Frigid Tempest} has a higher chance to freeze enemies.
{Thunder Tempest} has a chance to shock enemies.
{Wind Tempest} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ts85i-4.name: Thunderous Storm
description: You have a chance to also cast {Thunder Tempest} when you attack with cold or physical Tempest Strike.

ts85i-5.name: Grand Cyclone
description: You have a chance to also cast {Wind Tempest} when you attack with lightning or cold Tempest Strike.

ts85i-6.name: Nature's Storm
description: If Tempest Strike's melee attack does not hit an enemy you consume a stack of {Gladiator of Lagon} to cast a {Tempest} of the respective type.

ts85i-7.name: Scheme of the Architect
description: {Gladiator of Lagon} has double the effect on your totems and {Storm Crows} if you have at least 50 Intelligence.

ts85i-8.name: Stormriding Companions
description: Tempest Strike penetrates enemy physical resistance per active physical minion, penetrates cold resistance per cold minion and penetrates lightning resistance per lightning minion.
reminderText: For example Wolves are a physical minion by default but can be specialized into being either a cold or lightning minion.

ts85i-9.name: Bulwark of Nature
description: Whenever you cast a {Tempest} you also regain a portion of your Endurance Threshold as health.

ts85i-10.name: Druid's Call
description:
While transformed and you use any melee attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to cast each {Tempest} of a matching damage type.

This consumes mana equal to a portion of Tempest Strike's mana cost.
reminderText: For example if you use {Swipe} while transformed as a {Werebear}, you have a chance to cast a {Wind Tempest} on hit.

ts85i-11.name: Attuned Slam
description: Tempest Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 1 mana cost, but it also costs additional mana.

ts85i-12.name: Looming Gale
description: You now create a {Tempest Totem} that casts a {Tempest} of the corresponding strike that created the totem. You are limited to 1 of each type of totem.
reminderText:
Disabling a type of {Tempest} causes the respective totem to cast cold projectiles instead.

Attack speed modifiers from this tree affect the summoning speed, but not the totem's cast speed.

ts85i-13.name: Rousing Symbols
description: Your {Tempest Totems} gain a random amount of more cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers) when summoned.

ts85i-14.name: Sky Opener
description:
You now expend {Storm Stacks} when you use Tempest Strike and hit at least one enemy with the melee attack.

{Storm Bolts} cast this way deal more damage.

ts85i-15.name: Windfury Force
description: Tempest Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

ts85i-16.name: Heorot's Arsenal
stats: +5 Melee Damage With Axe Or Mace
description: Tempest Strike deals additional melee damage per equipped axe or mace and additional spell damage while wielding a 2 handed weapon.

ts85i-17.name: Firm Grip
description:
Tempest Strike deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

These effects are doubled while wielding a 2 handed weapon.

ts85i-18.name: Calm Seas
description:
Tempest Strike can no longer cast {Wind Tempest}, but it does not remove the physical strike from the combo.

Additioanlly, Tempest Strike has increased attack speed and costs less mana.

ts85i-19.name: Crashing Waves
description:
Tempest Strike deals additional melee damage per 2 Attunement.

All the melee strikes have a higher chance to freeze enemies.

ts85i-20.name: Grounded Refuge
description:
Tempest Strike can no longer cast {Thunder Tempest}, but it does not remove the lightning strike from the combo.

Additioanlly, Tempest Strike has increased attack speed and costs less mana.

ts85i-21.name: Gladiator of Lagon
description:
The melee hits grant you a stack of {Gladiator of Lagon} for 8 seconds which grants you and your minions additional spell damage.

This effect can trigger a maximum of 3 times per second.

ts85i-23.name: Resurgence of the Land
stats: 5 Mana Gain On Hit With No Tempest
description: You recover mana if whenever you use Tempest Strike and it hits an enemy and it doesn't cast a {Tempest}.

ts85i-24.name: Warm Shelter
description:
Tempest Strike can no longer cast {Frigid Tempest}, but it does not remove the cold strike from the combo.

Additioanlly, Tempest Strike has increased attack speed and costs less mana.

ts85i-25.name: Ancestral Swiftness
description: Tempest Strike has increased attack speed and costs less mana.

ts85i-26.name: Soaring Blows
stats: +1% Physical Pen Per 5% Uncapped Physical Res
+1% Cold Pen Per 5% Uncapped Cold Res
+1% Lighting Pen Per 5% Uncapped Lighting Res
description: Tempest Strike penetrates enemy resistances per your uncapped resistances corresponding to a specific type.

ts85i-27.name: Wind Booster
description:
Whenever you cast {Wind Tempest} you and your other allies it touches gain {Haste} for a short duration.

Additionally, Tempest Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) while you have Haste.

ts85i-28.name: Ceaseless Tyhoon
description:
Whenever you cast {Wind Tempest} you have a chance to also cast {Tornado}.

This consumes mana equal to a portion of Tornados mana cost.

ts85i-29.name: Devastating Whirlwind
description: {Tornados} cast from {Wind Tempest} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

ts85i-30.name: Blizzard's Wrath
description: You have a chance to also cast {Frigid Tempest} when you attack with lightning or physical Tempest Strike.

ts85i-32.name: Coldest Night
description:
{Frigid Tempest} chills on enemies it hits.

Additionally, Tempest Strike has a higher chance to freeze enemies.

ts85i-33.name: Wrath of the Mountain
stats: Frigid Tempest Each Second During Avalanche
description: While channeling {Avalanche} you now also cast {Frigid Tempest} every second.

ts85i-34.name: Fulminating Strikes
description:
{Thunder Tempest} shocks enemies it hits.

Additionally, Tempest Strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to shocked enemies.

ts85i-35.name: Cloudburst Conduit
description: Whenever you cast {Thunder Tempest} you also cast it around your nearest {Storm Totem}.

uph41-0.name: Upheaval
description: Sunders the ground in a line in front of you, dealing damage to enemies along the path.

uph41-2.name: Tremblor
stats: Buff To Next Fury Leap Or Earthquake
description: When you directly use Upheaval and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of {Earth Shattering} up to a maximum, causing your next {Fury Leap} or {Earthquake} to consume all stacks to gain additional physical penetration and increased area per stack consumed.
reminderText: This has no effect if Upheaval is used by a totem.

uph41-3.name: Excavating Blow
description:
Upheaval now splits up into 3 fault lines in front of you, but Upheaval costs additional mana. Enemies can only be hit by 1 Fault Line at a time.

Upheaval Totems now have 50% less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

uph41-4.name: Erupting Earth
description: Upheaval now travels in 5 fault lines in a star around you.

uph41-5.name: Glacial Cascade
description:
Upheaval's base physical damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Upheaval has a chance to freeze enemies on hit.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} chance and slow chance from all sources is converted to chill chance.

uph41-6.name: Sundering Strike
description: When Upheaval hits an enemy it has a chance to release a {Shockwave}, a melee physical subskill. The Shockwave cannot hit enemies already hit by Upheaval and vice versa.
reminderText: Enemies hit by a Shockwave can not create a Shockwave, even if hit by Upheaval.

uph41-7.name: Inexhaustible
description: Upheaval costs less mana and has a chance to shred enemy armor.

uph41-8.name: Mantle Strike
description: Improves Upheaval's base critical strike chance and it cannot be dodged.

uph41-9.name: Crust Rupture
description: Upheaval critical strikes deal more damage.

uph41-10.name: Stonethorn Pillars
stats: +30% Upheaval Totem Damage Per Totem Consumed
description: Creating an Upheaval Totem consumes all active {Thorn Totems} to grant it more damage per totem consumed (multiplicative with other modifiers). You can now create an additional maximum Upheaval totem and you have an additional charge.

uph41-11.name: Mountain Fortress
description: You can now create an additional maximum Upheaval Totem and you have an additional charge.

uph41-12.name: Frozen Collision
description: Upheaval deals additional melee cold damage, and also deals more melee damage to frozen enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

uph41-13.name: Cold Front
description: Upheaval has additional freeze rate.

uph41-14.name: Sublimation
description: You cast {Shatter} on enemies you kill with Upheaval, a spell subskill dealing cold damage in an area.

uph41-15.name: Quarry Maker
description: Upheaval now creates additional fault lines and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but costs more mana.

uph41-16.name: Maiming Rubble
description:
Upheaval hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed and have a chance to slow them.

This effect is doubled while using a two handed weapon.

uph41-17.name: Terrain Delving
description: Upheaval deals damage in a wider area.
reminderText: This does not cause Upheaval to travel further.

uph41-18.name: Primal Bulwark
stats: +1 Endurance Threshold Per Attunement Per Stack
description: When you use Upheaval and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of {Earth Armor} for 6 seconds up to a maximum amount of stacks, granting you additional armor and endurance threshold per stack of Attunement.
reminderText: This has no effect if Upheaval is used by a totem.

uph41-19.name: Through Muck and Clay
stats: Consume Earth Armor Falling Below 6 Maelstroms
description: While you have {Earth Armor}, if you fall below 6 stacks of {Maelstrom} you consume all stacks of Earth Armor to cast Maelstrom once per stack consumed.

uph41-20.name: Terraforming Clash
description: Upheaval travels further.

uph41-21.name: Earthbreaker
description: Upheaval deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but no longer scales with increases to attack speed.

uph41-22.name: Glacial Crash
description:
Upheaval penetrates enemy physical and cold resistance.

This effect is doubled while using a two handed weapon.

uph41-23.name: Natural Weapons
description: Upheaval has increased area while using a mace, additional bleed chance while using an axe and additional cold penetration while using a staff.

uph41-24.name: Unstoppable Strength
description: Upheaval deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a higher chance to stun enemies.

uph41-25.name: Brutish Engagement
description: Upheaval deals more melee damage to enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on how close they are to you, up to a maximum.
reminderText: This is fully effective within 2 meters and has no effect after 6 meters.

uph41-26.name: Hindering Tremors
description: Upheaval hits have a chance to apply {Frailty} to enemies and it penetrates enemy physical resistance, but travels a shorter distance.

uph41-27.name: Rock Upsurge
description: When Upheaval hits your totems it has a chance to release a {Shockwave} from the totem.
reminderText: Totems hit by a Shockwave can create a Shockwave when hit by Upheaval.

uph41-28.name: Master of the Totem
description: Upheaval hits grant your totems increased armor and more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for 4 seconds. This effect can stack an unlimited amount of times.

uph41-29.name: Rejuvenating Splinters
description: Upheaval and {Shockwave} hits from the {Sundering Strikes} node now {Shatter} totems, releasing shards of rock and debris dealing spell physical damage and heals you per point of Attunement.
reminderText: Upheaval Totems cannot be shattered this way.

uph41-30.name: Upheaval Totems
description: You now create an {Upheaval Totem} that attacks with Upheaval from it rather than yourself. You are limited to 1 of these totems. Upheaval now has a cooldown and costs significantly more mana.

wb8fo-2.name: Ursine Heart
description: You have additional endurance and endurance threshold while in Werebear Form.

wb8fo-3.name: Frenzied Strikes
description: You regain additional {Rage} if you hit at least one enemy with {Swipe}.

wb8fo-4.name: Relentless Thunder
description: For 6 seconds after you enter Werebear Form, you deal more Lightning Damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and 100% of Swipe's Base Damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with lightning damage instead of physical damage.

wb8fo-5.name: Wisened Claws
description: You gain additional spell damage per point of Strength while in Werebear Form.

wb8fo-6.name: Ursine Storm
stats: +8% Chance To Cast Maelstrom On Use
description:
You have a chance to cast {Maelstrom} when you use Swipe or Maul and hit at least one enemy.

This consumes Maelstrom's mana cost as Rage.

wb8fo-7.name: Rip and Tear
description: Maul and Rampage deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wb8fo-8.name: Dauntless
description: Rampage has increased movement speed, a higher chance to stun enemies and stuns inflicted by Rampage last longer.

wb8fo-9.name: Apex Predator
description: Rampage deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and you have global increased damage while Rampaging.

wb8fo-10.name: Eterra's Renewal
description: When you leave Werebear Form you cleanse all negative ailments and gain {Haste} for 3 seconds.

wb8fo-11.name: Voice of the Thicket
description:
After using Rampage, Human Form is now replaced with {Arboreal Protection}, which casts {Thorn Shield} on you and up to 5 nearby allies and transforms you to {Spriggan Form}.

This requires you to have Spriggan Form unlocked.

wb8fo-12.name: Intimidating Cry
description:
After using Rampage, you now {Roar}.

This consumes Warcry's mana cost as Rage and puts it on cooldown.
reminderText: This uses {Warcry's} skill tree.

wb8fo-13.name: Army Sunderer
description: Rampage and Maul hits shred enemy armor.
reminderText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.

wb8fo-14.name: Unending Storm
description:
Rampage has no cooldown.

While using Rampage you move more slowly, but deal more lightning damage. Both of these effects are multiplicative with other modifiers.

wb8fo-15.name: Insatiable
stats: +2% Base Crit Chance For Maul And Rampage
description: Maul and Rampage have improve base critical strike chance and you have global increased critical strike chance while in Werebear Form.

wb8fo-17.name: Crackling Assault
stats: 1 Lightning Strikes Per Second While Rampaging
description: You cast {Storm Bolts} from the sky a number of times each second while Rampaging.

wb8fo-18.name: Invigoration
stats: +3 Health Gained On Kill Or Hit
+3 Rage Gained On Kill Or Hit
description: You regain health and {Rage} on kill or when you hit a rare or boss enemy.

wb8fo-19.name: Bloodthirst
description:
Your hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed while in Werebear Form.

This chance is doubled for Maul.

wb8fo-21.name: Territorial
description: Maul and Roar affects a larger area.

wb8fo-22.name: Fury of the Maul
description: Maul has a shorter cooldown.

wb8fo-24.name: Wild Command
description: When you use Maul and hit at least one enemy, your minions deal increased damage for 8 seconds. This effect can stack.

wb8fo-25.name: Enrage
stats: +2 Rage Gain On Roar Per Enemy
+15 Health Gain On Roar Per Enemy
description: You regain {Rage} and health with Roar per enemy hit, up to a maximum number of enemies.

wb8fo-26.name: Bringer of Storms
stats: Armor Shred And Bleed -> Shock Chance
description:
Maul and Rampage's base physical damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Armor Shred and bleed chance from all sources is converted to shock and effects related to armor shred or bleed now depend on shock instead for Maul and Rampage.

wb8fo-27.name: Pummel and Bash
stats: +2 Rage Gained With Maul To Stunned
description: Maul deals more melee damage to stunned enemies and you regain {Rage} when you hit a stunned enemy with Maul.

wb8fo-29.name: Ruthless
description: Your {Rage} decays slower while in Werebear Form.

wb8fo-31.name: Skull Crusher
stats: Consumes Fury Leap's Mana Cost As Rage
description:
Your {Fury Leap} tree now applies to Maul. 

This consumes Fury Leap's mana cost as Rage.
reminderText: You still use Maul's travel distance.

wb8fo-32.name: Tremor Slam
description:
After using Maul, you now use {Upheaval} towards your target.

This consumes Upheaval's mana cost.
reminderText: If you have the {Skull Crusher} node that makes {Fury Leap}'s tree apply to Maul and you have the {Violent Upheaval} node that tree causes it to cast {Upheaval} then instead of Upheaval being cast twice, it is cast once but that cast deals 30% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wb8fo-33.name: Barrage of the Swarm
description:
After directly using Roar, Human Form is now replaced with {Swarm Call}, which summons a {Locust} for each nearby stunned enemy up to 6 and transforms you to {Swarmblade Form}.

This requires you to have Swarmblade Form unlocked.

wb8fo-34.name: Woodland Bear
description:
After using Maul, you now cast {Entangling Roots}.

This consumes Entangling Roots' mana cost as Rage.

wc57-0.name: Warcry
description: Unleash a mighty roar that stuns and knocks back nearby enemies.

wc57-2.name: Deep Roar
description: Warcry affects a larger area.

wc57-3.name: Battle Cry
description: You and allies affected by Warcry gain increased crit chance for 4 seconds.

wc57-4.name: Ferocity
description:
While Warcry is on cooldown, your critical strikes have a chance to use Warcry for you. 

This effect can only happen once per direct Warcry use, and it will reset the cooldown.

wc57-5.name: Jormun's Wrath
description:
Warcry now freezes enemies instead of stunning them, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to {Frostbite} chance and effects related to bleed now depend on Frostbite instead.
reminderText: Physical damage from {Kinetic Scream} is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage.

wc57-6.name: Frost Claw
description: You and allies affected by Warcry deal increased cold damage for 4 seconds.

wc57-7.name: Bringer of Winter
description: You and your cold minions affected by Warcry gain increased crit chance and additional chill chance for 4 seconds.
reminderText: As an example if you take the {Tundra Stalkers} on your {Summon Wolf's} tree, it would gain the cold tag and be considered a cold minion.

wc57-8.name: Heart of Rime
description: Warcry inflicts stacks of {Frostbite} to affected enemies.

wc57-9.name: Frigid Breath
description: Enemies frozen by Warcry take increased damage from hits.

wc57-10.name: Debilitating Shout
description: Warcry applies one stack of {Frailty} to affected enemies for a short duration.

wc57-11.name: Toxic Companions
description: For 4 seconds after using Warcry, your {Wolves} have a chance to cause enemies to bleed and your {Scorpion} has a chance to poison enemies.

wc57-12.name: Juggernaut
description: You are invulnerable for 1 second after using Warcry.

wc57-13.name: Breath of Eterra
description:
Warcry now also restores your health. 

The amount of healing is increased by healing effectiveness and is doubled if used while on low health.

wc57-14.name: Whirlpool
description:
You now cast {Maelstrom} when you use Warcry. 

Maelstrom cast this way costs less mana.

wc57-15.name: Purging Shout
description: Warcry now cleanses negative ailments on you.

wc57-16.name: Invigorate
description:
Warcry now also restores ally health for the same amount as from {Breath of Eterra}. 

The amount of healing is increased by healing effectiveness and is doubled if used while on low health.

wc57-17.name: Hastily Advance
description: If Warcry hits at least one enemy, you gain {Haste} for 1 second.

wc57-18.name: Energized Charge
description: Warcry costs less mana and {Haste} gained from {Hastily Advance} lasts longer.

wc57-19.name: Raging Frenzy
description: You gain {Frenzy} for the same duration as you have Haste from {Hastily Advance}.

wc57-20.name: Frightful Presence
description: Warcry now fears enemies for 2 seconds instead of stunning them.
reminderText:
Fear causes enemies to flee from you and your allies. Enemies can only be affected by Fear once.

This has no effect if you have {Jormun's Wrath}.

wc57-21.name: Horrifying Cry
stats: +2% Damage to Feared per Berserk Stack
description: Fear inflicted by Warcry lasts longer and each stack of the {Berserk} buff from the Berserker node now also causes you to deal more damage to Feared enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wc57-22.name: Berserker
stats: +1 Berserk Stacks On Hit While Berserk
description:
You gain the {Berserk} buff for 1 second when you use Warcry, granting you additional melee damage.

While you have Berserk, you gain additional stacks of Berserk on melee hit up to a maximum, and melee hits refresh all stacks.
reminderText: With {Totemic Heart} you gain Berserk when you place the totem.

wc57-24.name: Brutality
description: {Berserk} has increased duration and additional maximum stacks.
reminderText: While you have Berserk, you gain additional stacks of Berserk on melee hit up to a maximum, and melee hits refresh all stacks.

wc57-25.name: Bloodthirst
description: {Berserk} now also affects your Raptor and Bear.
reminderText: While you have Berserk, you gain additional stacks of Berserk on melee hit up to a maximum, and melee hits refresh all stacks.

wc57-26.name: Fury Strikes
description: {Berserk} now also grants you increased attack speed per stack of Berserk up to a maximum.
reminderText: While you have Berserk, you gain additional stacks of Berserk on melee hit up to a maximum, and melee hits refresh all stacks.

wc57-27.name: Staggering Roar
description: Warcry knocks enemies further back.

wc57-28.name: Apprehend
description: Warcry now pulls enemies instead of knocking them back.
reminderText: Modifiers to knockback distance now affect pull distance.

wc57-29.name: Challenging Might
description: Warcry now also taunts affected enemies for a short duration.
reminderText: This effect does not work if Warcry is used by a totem.

wc57-30.name: Kinetic Scream
description: Warcry now hits enemies and deals spell physical damage.
reminderText: Added spell damage now applies to Warcry at 200% effectiveness.

wc57-31.name: Eviscerating Howl
description: Warcry causes enemies to bleed.

wc57-32.name: Shallow Breath
description: Warcry now has a cooldown of 5 seconds which cannot be reduced by stunning or freezing enemies, but Warcry no longer has a guaranteed stun, freeze, or fear.
reminderText: This cooldown can be affected by other sources of cooldown reduction.

wc57-33.name: Totemic Heart
description: You now place down a totem for 3 seconds that repeatedly uses Warcry instead of you, but Warcry costs more mana.
reminderText:
Warcry cannot taunt if used by a totem.

When used by a totem Warcry benefits from your minion and totem stats rather than your own stats.

wo42-2.name: Canine Agility
description: Your Wolves have additional dodge chance, and have increased dodge rating for each point of strength you have.

wo42-3.name: Leap Attack
description: Your Wolves gain a {Leap Attack} to close the gap on distant enemies. Leap Attack has a 10 second cooldown.

wo42-4.name: Victory Howl
description: Wolves have a chance to {Howl} on kill. This does not expend Howl's mana cost or put it on cooldown.

wo42-5.name: Serrated Claws
description: Wolves have a chance to cause enemies to bleed with their melee attacks.

wo42-6.name: Patient Hunters
description: Wolves deal more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers) and bleed they inflict has additional Physical Penetration.

wo42-7.name: Snarl
description:
When you kill an enemy one of your Wolves has a chance to {Howl}. This does not expend Howl's mana cost or put it on cooldown.

Howl also grants more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and increased melee attack speed to all affected allies.

wo42-8.name: On the Hunt
description: Wolves have increased attack and move speed.

wo42-9.name: Savage Hunters
description: Wolves deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wo42-10.name: Legendary Bite
description: Your Wolves' melee hits deal more damage, have a greater chance to stun (both multiplicative with other modifiers) and it has improved base critical strike enemies, but has less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wo42-11.name: Pack Hunters
description:
You can have an additional Wolf active at once.

You can have an additional companion active at once.

The extra wolf counts towards your companion limit.

wo42-12.name: Earthborn
description: Wolves have additional armor, and their attacks leech a portion of the physical damage they deal as health.

wo42-13.name: Winterborn
description: Wolves have a chance to chill enemies on hit.

wo42-14.name: Tundra Stalkers
description: Wolves deal additional cold damage with attacks, and have an increased chance to stun enemies.

wo42-16.name: Wolfen Recovery
description: Wolves have additional base health regeneration and increased health regeneration.

wo42-17.name: Safety In Numbers
description: You can summon Wolves up to your maximum number of companions.
reminderText: When you cast Summon Wolf, you will summon wolves up to your companion limit.

wo42-18.name: Stormborn
description: Your Wolves have a chance to retaliate with {Storm Bolt} when hit or when they hit an enemy.
reminderText: {Storm Bolts} cast by your Wolves are affected by your {Gathering Storm} tree and scale with minion damage.

wo42-19.name: Lupine Endurance
description: Your Wolves have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wo42-20.name: Storm Caller's Reprisal
description: Your Wolves have a chance to retaliate with {Storm Bolt} when hit, and deal more spell damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Storm Bolts} cast by your Wolves are affected by your {Gathering Storm} tree and scale with minion damage.

wo42-21.name: Cloud Runners
description: Your Wolves deal more lightning damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

wo42-22.name: Storm Jaws
description: Your Wolves' melee attacks deal additional lightning damage.

wo42-23.name: Shaman's Bond
description: Your Wolves now deal increase damage and have increased health for each point of Attunement you have.
reminderText: This scales with your attunement, not the attunement of your wolves.

wo42-24.name: Howl of Might
description: Wolves have more damage and dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers). This bonus is tripled for Wolves that have used {Howl} recently.
reminderText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds

wo42-25.name: Relentless
description: Your Wolves cannot be stunned.

wo42-26.name: Battlecry
description: The buffs granted by {Howl} last longer and wolves have a chance to Howl when they hit a rare or boss enemy. This does not expend Howl's mana cost or put it on cooldown.

wo42-27.name: Call of the Wind
description: Your Wolves' {Howl} also grant {Haste} for a short duration.

wo42-28.name: Crippling Wounds
description: Bleed inflicted by Wolves lasts longer and wolves have a chance to slow on hit and when hit.

wo42-29.name: Frozen Fangs
description:
Your Wolves gain the {Ice Bite} ability, which deals higher damage in a larger area, with a 6 second cooldown. 20% of the remaining cooldown is recovered every time the Wolf hits with an ability other than Ice Bite, including their basic attack.

Ice Bite deals melee cold damage. Consequently this damage scales with your wolves' increases to melee and cold damage, but not increases to their physical damage.
reminderText: Ice Bite has 100% increased radius relative to the wolves' basic attack.
